src: "D-dag-landingerne og de følgende slag havde befriet det nordlige Frankrig, men den sydlige del var stadig ikke fri. Det blev regeret af den franske Vichy-regering - der er franskmænd, som havde sluttet fred med tyskerne i 1940 og arbejdede sammen med dem i stedet for at bekæmpe dem. Den 15. august 1940 invaderede de allierede tropper det sydlige Frankrig; invasionen blev kaldt ""Operation Dragoon"". På bare to uger havde amerikanerne og de frie franske styrker befriet det sydlige Frankrig og var ved at fokusere mod Tyskland."
mt: "D-Day landings and the following battles had freed northern France, but the southern part was still not free. It was ruled by the French Vichy government - there are Frenchmen who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with them instead of fighting them. On August 15, 1940, the Allied troops invaded southern France; the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks, the Americans and the Free French forces had freed southern France and were focusing on Germany."
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: Ubåde er skibe der er designet til at rejse under vand, og forblive der i en længevarende tidsperiode. Ubåde blev benyttet i både den første og anden verdenskrig. Dengang var de meget langsomme og havde en meget begrænset skydnings rækkevidde. I starten af krigen rejste de primært ovenpå vandet, men da radaren begyndte at udvikle sig og blev mere præcis, blev ubådene tvunget til at gå under vandet for at undgå at blive set. Tyske undervandsbåde blev kaldt for U-både. Tyskerne var meget dygtige til at styre og betjene deres undervandsbåde. På grund af deres succes med ubåde, har man siden krigen ikke stolet nok på tyskerne til at lade dem have mange af dem.
mt: Submarines are ships designed to travel under water, and remain there for a long period of time. Submarines were used in both the first and second world war. At the time they were very slow and had a very limited range of fire. In the beginning of the war they primarily traveled above water, but as radar began to develop and become more precise, submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-boats. The Germans were very skilled at controlling and operating their submarines. Due to their success with submarines, since the war one has not trusted the Germans enough to let them have many of them.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: Den 17. september 1939 var det polske forsvar allerede brudt, og det eneste håb var at trække sig tilbage og reorganisere sig langs det rumænske brohoved. Disse planer blev dog forældet næsten fra den ene dag til den anden, da over 800.000 soldater fra Sovjetunionens Røde Hær indtog og oprettede de hviderussiske og ukrainske fronter efter at have invaderet Polens østlige regioner i strid med Riga-fredstraktaten, den polsk-sovjetiske ikke-angrebspagt samt andre internationale traktater, både bilaterale og multilaterale.
mt: 17 September 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganize along the Romanian bridgehead. These plans were however outdated almost from one day to the next, as over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet Union's Red Army invaded and established the Byelorussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading Poland's eastern regions in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Polish-Soviet non-aggression pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Italienerne havde problemer i Nordafrika næsten fra starten. Inden for en uge efter, at Italien havde erklæret krig d. 10. juni 1940, havde Storbritanniens 11. husarer overtaget Fort Capuzzo i Libyen. I et bagholdsangreb øst for Bardia tog briterne General Lastucci til fange. Han var den italienske tiende hærs ingeniør-general. Den 28. juni blev marskal Italo Balbo, generalguvernør af Libyen og tilsyneladende Mussolinis efterfølger, dræbt ved egenbeskydning under landing i Tobruk.
mt: The Italians had problems in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy declaring war on June 10, 1940, Britain's 11th Hussars had taken Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In a surprise attack east of Bardia, the British took General Lastucci prisoner. He was the Italian 10th Army's engineer general. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, governor-general of Libya and apparently Mussolini's successor, was killed by friendly fire during landing in Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: "Den tibetanske buddhisme er baseret på Buddhas lære, men blev udvidet af kærlighedsstien mahayana og med en masse teknikker fra indisk yoga. I princippet er den tibetanske buddhisme meget enkel. Den består af Kundalini-yoga, meditation og stien af altomfattende kærlighed. Med Kundalini Yoga bliver Kundalini-energien vækket til live (oplysningsenergi) gennem yogastillinger, vejrtrækningsøvelser, mantraer og visualiseringer. Centret for tibetansk meditation er guddommelighedsyogaen (""Deity Yoga""). Gennem visualiseringen af forskellige guddommeligheder bliver energikanalerne renset, chakraerne bliver aktiveret, og oplysningsbevidstheden bliver skabt."
mt: "Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but was expanded by the path of compassion mahayana and with a lot of techniques from Indian yoga. In principle, Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini yoga, meditation and the path of all-encompassing compassion. With Kundalini Yoga Kundalini energy is awakened to life (illumination energy) through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center for Tibetan meditation is the deity yoga (""Deity Yoga""). Through the visualization of different deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated, and the illumination consciousness is created."
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Programmet startede kl. 20:30 lokal tid (15.00 UTC). Berømte sangere overalt i landet spillede bhajans, eller tilbedelsessange for Shri Shyams fødder. Sangeren Sanju Sharma begyndte aftenen, efterfulgt af Jai Shankar Choudhary, ............. præsenterede chhappan bhog bhajan. Sangeren Raju Khandelwal ledsagede ham. Dernæst tog Lakkha Singh føringen for at synge bhajanerne. 108 tallerkener med Chhappan Bhog (56 forskellige spiselige elementer, såsom slik, frugter, nødder, madretter osv. som er ofret til guderne i hinduismen) blev serveret til Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh præsenterede også chhappan bhog bhajan. Sangeren Raju Khandelwal gjorde ham selskab.
mt: The program started at 8:30 pm local time (3:00 pm UTC). Famous singers all over the country sang bhajans, or hymns for Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary,............. presented chhappan bhog bhajan. Singer Raju Khandelwal accompanied him. Next, Lakkha Singh took the lead to sing bhajans. 108 plates with Chhappan Bhog (56 different edible elements, such as candy, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to gods in Hinduism) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh also presented chhappan bhog bhajan. Singer Raju Khandelwal made him company.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

mt: The program started at 8:30 pm local time (3:00 pm UTC). Famous singers all over the country sang bhajans, or hymns for Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary,............. presented chhappan bhog bhajan. Singer Raju Khandelwal accompanied him. Next, Lakkha Singh took the lead to sing bhajans. 108 plates with Chhappan Bhog (56 different edible elements, such as candy, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to gods in Hinduism) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh also presented chhappan bhog bhajan. Singer Raju Khandelwal made him company.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: "Festlighederne startede med et fremragende show fra den verdenskendte gruppe, Cirque du Soleil. De blev efterfulgt af Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, et janitshar-band, og sangerne Fatih Erkoç og Müslüm Gürses. Så gik hvirvlende dervish-dansere på scenen. Den tyrkiske diva, Sezen Aksu, optrådte med den italienske tenor Alessandro Safina samt den græske sangerinde, Haris Alexiou. Til sidst blev showet ""Troy"" opført af den tyrkiske dansegruppe, ""Fire of Anatolia""."
mt: "The celebrations started with a great show from the world-renowned group, Cirque du Soleil. They were followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a janissary band, and singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Dervish dancers whirled on the stage. The Turkish diva, Sezen Aksu, performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and the Greek singer Haris Alexiou. Finally, the show ""Troy"" was performed by the Turkish dance group, ""Fire of Anatolia""."
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: "Passagererne fik udleveret vand, da de ventede i over 32 graders varme. Brandkaptajn Scott Kouns sagde: ""Det var en meget varm dag i Santa Clara med temperaturer helt oppe i 90'erne. At sidde fast i en rutsjebane blot et øjeblik er mildest talt ubehageligt, og det tog mindst en time at hjælpe den første person ned fra forlystelsen."""
mt: "Passengers were given water as they waited in over 32 degree heat. Fire Captain Scott Kouns said: "It was a very hot day in Santa Clara with temperatures all the way up in the 90s. Sitting stuck on a roller coaster for just a moment is at least uncomfortable, and it took at least an hour to help the first person off the ride.""
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Ifølge den seneste bulletin indikerer målinger af havniveauet, at en tsunami var opstået. Nogle klare tsunamiaktiviteter registreredes nær Pago Pago og Niue. Ingen store skader eller personskader er blevet rapporteret i Tonga, men strømmen var dog midlertidigt nede, hvilket eftersigende gjorde, at myndighederne i Tonga ikke kunne modtage tsunamiadvarslerne udsendt af PTWC. Fjorten skoler beliggende på eller nær kystlinjen på Hawaii lukkede hele onsdagen, på trods af at varslerne var hævet.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, measurements of the harbor indicate a tsunami has occurred. Some clear tsunami activity was recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or casualties have been reported in Tonga, but the power was temporarily down, which prevented authorities in Tonga from receiving the tsunami warnings issued by PTWC. Fourteen schools located on or near the coast of Hawaii closed for the entire Wednesday, despite the warnings being lifted.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Jonny Reid, medchauffør for det new zealandske A1GP team, skrev historie i dag ved at køre hurtigst over den 48 år gamle Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, helt lovligt. Mr Reid formåede at køre New Zealands A1GP-bil, Black Beauty, over broen syv gange med en hastighed på over 160 km/t. Det newzealandske politi havde svært ved at bruge deres fartkontrol til at se hvor hurtigt Hr. Reid virkelig kørte, på grund af hvor lav Black Beauty er. Den eneste gang politiet formåede at fange Hr. Reid, var da han satte farten ned til 160 km/t.
mt: Jonny Reid, the co-driver for the New Zealand A1GP team, wrote history today by driving fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, completely legally. Mr Reid managed to drive New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty, over the bridge seven times with a speed of over 160 km/h. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed control to see how fast Mr. Reid really drove, because of how low Black Beauty is. The only time the police managed to catch Mr. Reid, was when he slowed down to 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Et moderat jordskælv rystede det vestlige Montana mandag kl. 22:08. Ingen umiddelbare skadesrapporter er modtaget af United States Geological Survey (USGS) og deres National Earthquake Information Center. Jordskælvet var centreret omkring 20 km (15 mil) nord-nordøst for Dillon og omkring 65 km (40 mil) syd for Butte.
mt: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana on Monday at 22:08. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and their National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Iraks Abu Ghraib-fængsel er blevet sat i brand under et oprør. Fængslet blev berygtet, da fangermisbrug blev opdaget, efter de amerikanske styrker overtog ledelsen.
mt: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison was set on fire during a riot. The prison was notorious when prisoner abuse was discovered after the U.S. forces took over the leadership.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Bandet undskyldte til deres fans og aflyste showet på Mauis War Memorial Stadium, som var planlagt til at blive overværet af 9.000 mennesker, HK Management Inc., der er bandets administrationsselskab, gav ikke nogen umiddelbar begrundelse, da de aflyste den 20. september, men begrundede det med logistiske årsager den følgende dag.
mt: The band apologized to their fans and canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was planned to be attended by 9,000 people, HK Management Inc., the band's management company, did not give any immediate reason for the cancellation on September 20, but gave logistical reasons the following day.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: "Det rapporteres, at omfattende plyndringer fortsatte i løbet af natten, da politifolk ikke var til stede på Bishkeks gader. Bishkek blev af en tilskuer beskrevet som synkende ned i en tilstand af ""anarki"", da bander af folk gik rundt på gaderne og plyndrede dagligvarebutikker. Flere af Bishkeks indbyggere gav skylden for lovløsheden til demonstranterne fra syden."
mt: "It is reported that widespread looting continued throughout the night as police were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described by an observer as sinking into a state of "anarchy" as bands of people roamed the streets and looted grocery stores. Many of Bishkek's residents blamed the lawlessness on the southern demonstrators."
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Rings CEO Jamie Siminoff har tidligere udtalt, at virksomheden startede da hans dørklokke ikke kunne høres fra hans værksted i garagen. Han fortalte, at han byggede en WiFi-dørklokke. Siminoff udtalte, at salget steg, efter at han i 2013 medvirkede i et afsnit af Shark Tank, hvor panelet afviste at finansiere den nystartede virksomhed. Sidste i 2017 optrådte Siminoff på tv-kanalen til shopping QVC. Ring indgik også forlig med det konkurrerende sikkerhedsfirma, ADT Corporation.
mt: CEO Jamie Siminoff has previously stated that the company started when his doorbell could not be heard from his workshop in the garage. He said he built a WiFi doorbell. Siminoff stated that sales increased after he appeared on Shark Tank in 2013, where the panel rejected financing the newly launched company. Last in 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping TV channel QVC. Ring also settled with the competing security firm, ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: "PBS-showet har vundet mere end to dusin Emmy-priser, og den har løbet i længere tid end alle andre programmer på nær Sesame Street og Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Hver episode af showet fokuserede på et tema i en bestemt bog, og dette tema blev derefter udforsket gennem flere historier. Hvert show gav også anbefalinger til bøger, som børn skulle lede efter, når de gik på biblioteket. John Grant fra WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbows hjemmekanal) sagde ""Reading Rainbow lærte børn, hvorfor de skulle læse... kærligheden til at læse – [showet] opfordrede til at tage en bog frem og til at læse."" Nogen mener, herunder John Grant, at både finansieringsknuden og skiftet i filosofien om undervisnings-TV havde indflydelse på, at serien sluttede."
mt: "The PBS show has won more than two dozen Emmy Awards, and it has been on the air longer than any other program except Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show focused on a theme in a particular book, and that theme was then explored through several stories. Each show also gave recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to the library. John Grant from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home channel) said ""Reading Rainbow taught children why they should read... the love of reading – [the show] encouraged taking a book out and reading."" Some, including John Grant, believe that both the funding crunch and the shift in educational TV philosophy had an effect on the show's ending."
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Tjenestemænd fra byen Amsterdam og Anne Franks Hus meddeler, at træet er inficeret med en svamp og udgør en sundhedsfare, da det var i overhængende fare for at vælte. Det var planen, at det skulle fældes tirsdag, men det blev reddet af en nødbestemmelse i retten.
mt: Officials from the city of Amsterdam and Anne Frank's House announced that the tree was infected with a fungus and posed a health hazard, as it was in imminent danger of falling. It was planned to be felled on Tuesday, but it was saved by an emergency ruling.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: "Animal Liberation og Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) opfordrer igen til, at det skal være obligatorisk at installere overvågningskameraer i alle australske slagterier. New South Wales' RSPCA-chefinspektør David O'Shannessy fortalte ABC, at overvågning og inspektion af slagterier burde være almindeligt forekommende i Australien. ""Overvågningen vil bestemt sende et stærkt signal til de mennesker der arbejder med dyr om, at deres velfærd er af den højeste prioriteret""."
mt: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) again urge that it should be mandatory to install surveillance cameras in all Australian slaughterhouses. New South Wales' RSPCA chief inspector David O'Shannessy told ABC, that surveillance and inspection of slaughterhouses should be commonplace in Australia. ""Surveillance will certainly send a strong signal to the people who work with animals about their welfare being of the highest priority."""
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Mens mindehøjtideligheder for Jeff Weise og tre af de ni ofre blev afholdt i dag, spredte nyheden om, at endnu en elev var blevet anholdt i forbindelse med skoleskyderiet d. 21. marts, sig i Red Lakes lokalsamfund. Myndighederne sagde ikke meget officielt ud over at bekræfte anholdelsen i dag. En kilde med kendskab til efterforskningen fortalte dog Minneapolis Star-Tribune, at det var Louis Jourdain, Floyd Jourdains 16-årige søn, som er formanden for Red Lake Tribal. Det vides på nuværende tidspunkt ikke, hvilke anklager han bliver tiltalt for, eller hvad der førte myndighederne til drengen, men procedure for mindreårige er blevet indledt ved føderal domstol.
mt: As memorials for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held today, news spread in Red Lake's local community that another student had been arrested in connection with the school shooting on March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming the arrest today. A source familiar with the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, Floyd Jourdain's 16-year-old son, who is president of the Red Lake Tribal Council. It is currently unknown what charges he is being charged with, or what led authorities to the boy, but proceedings for minors have been initiated at federal court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Arrangører af protesten fortalte, at cirka 100.000 mennesker dukkede op i tyske byer såsom Berlin, Köln, Hamborg og Hanover. I Berlin estimerede politiet 6.500 demonstranter. Demonstrationer fandt også sted i Paris, Sofia i Bulgarien, Vilnius i Litauen, Valetta i Malta, Tallinn i Estland samt Edinburgh og Glasgow i Skotland. I London protesterede cirka 200 mennesker uden for nogle store ophavsretshaveres kontorbygninger. Sidste måned var der store protester i Polen, da landet underskrev ACTA, hvilket har medført, at den polske regering har besluttet sig for ikke at godkende aftalen, for nu. Både Letland og Slovakiet har udsat processen med at tilslutte sig ACTA.
mt: 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 demonstrators. Demonstrations also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia as well as Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some of the major copyright holders' office buildings. Last month there were large protests in Poland, when the country signed ACTA, which has led the Polish government to decide not to approve the agreement, for now. Both Latvia and Slovakia have postponed the process of acceding to ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: "I omtrent 60 anmeldte tilfælde er defekte iPods blevet overophedet, hvilket har forårsaget i alt seks brande og givet fire personer mindre forbrændinger. Japans ministerium for økonomi, handel og industri (METI) oplyste, at de havde haft kendskab til 27 ulykker, som havde med enhederne at gøre. I sidste uge annoncerede METI, at Apple havde informeret dem om yderligere 34 tilfælde af overophedning, som virksomheden kaldte ""ikke-alvorlige."" Ministeriet svarede ved at kalde Apples udsættelse af rapporten for ""ganske beklagelig."""
mt: "In about 60 reported cases, defective iPods have been overheated, causing six fires and giving four people minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) reported that they had been aware of 27 incidents involving the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed them of an additional 34 cases of overheating, which the company called ""minor."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's delay in reporting the incidents ""quite regrettable.""
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs præsenterede enheden, da han trådte frem på scenen og tog sin iPhone op af bukselommen. Under hans to timers lange tale sagde han, at ""I dag genopfinder Apple telefonen, i dag skriver vi historie""."
mt: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs introduced the device as he stepped onto the stage and took his iPhone out of his pocket. During his two-hour long talk he said, "Today Apple reinvents the phone, today we write the history.""
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Den nuværende senator og argentinske førstedame Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner annoncerede i går aftes, at hun ville stille op til præsidentvalget. Annonceringen skete i La Plata, en by der ligger 50 kilometer (31 miles) fra Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner meddelte, at hun havde til hensigt at stille op som præsidentkandidat på Argentine Theatre, det samme sted hun brugte til at starte sin 2005-kampagne, hvor hun stillede op til senatet som et medlem af delegationen i Buenos Aires-provinsen.
mt: The current senator and Argentine first lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced yesterday evening that she would run for president. The announcement was made in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner said she intended to run as a presidential candidate at Argentine Theatre, the same place she used to start her 2005 campaign, where she ran for the Senate as a member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: "ACMA opdagede derudover også, at på trods af at videoen blev streamet på internettet, overtrådte ""Big Brother"" ikke lovgivningen om online indholdscensur, da videoen ikke var blevet gemt på ""Big Brother""s hjemmeside. Broadcasting Services-loven sørger for reguleringen af internetindhold. Dette skal dog rent fysisk befinde sig på en server for at blive betragtet som internetindhold."
mt: "ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed online, Big Brother did not breach online content censorship laws, as the video was not stored on Big Brother's website. Broadcasting Services Act regulates internet content. This must however physically reside on a server to be considered internet content."
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: "Peter Costello, som er en australsk kasserer og den person der højest sandsynligt kommer til at efterfølge premierminister John Howard som partileder i det liberale parti, har givet sin støtte til atomkraftindustrien i Australien. Mr Costello sagde, at når kernekraftproduktion bliver økonomisk levedygtig, burde Australien fortsætte med at bruge det. ""Hvis det bliver kommercielt, skal vi have det. Det vil sige, at der ikke er nogen principiel indvending imod atomenergi"", sagde Mr Costello."
mt: "Peter Costello, who is an Australian treasurer and the person most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as party leader, has given his support to the nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power production becomes economically viable, Australia should continue to use it. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there is no principled objection to nuclear energy"", said Mr Costello."
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Med kun atten tilgængelige medaljer om dagen, er der en række lande der ikke har nået medaljepodiet. De inkluderer Holland, hvor Anna Jochemsen endte på niendepladsen i kvinders stående klasse i Super-G i går, og Finland, hvor Katja Saarinen endte på tiendepladsen ved samme begivenhed. Australiens Mitchell Gourley kom på 11-pladsen i mænds stående Super-G. Den tjekkiske konkurrent Oldrich Jelinek sluttede som nummer 16 i mændenes siddende Super-G. Arly Velasquez fra Mexico blev nummer femten i herrernes siddende Super-G. New Zealands Adam Hall blev nummer ni i herrernes stående Super-G. Polens synshæmmede, mandlige skiløber Maciej Krezel og hans guide Anna Ogarzynska blev nummer tretten i Super-G. Sydkoreas Jong Seork Park blev nummer fireogtyve i herrernes siddende Super-G.
mt: With only eighteen medals available per day, there are a number of countries that have not yet reached the medal podium. These include the Netherlands, where Anna Jochemsen finished ninth in the women's standing Super-G yesterday, and Finland, where Katja Saarinen finished tenth at the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. The Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez from Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's visually impaired male skier Maciej Krezel and his guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: "Retssagen fandt sted i Birmingham Crown Court og afsluttede den 3. august. Værten, som blev anholdt på stedet, benægtede angrebet og hævdede, at han brugte stangen til at beskytte sig selv mod flasker, som op til 30 mennesker kastede efter ham. Blake blev også dømt for at forsøge at hindre rettens gang. Dommeren fortalte Blake, at det var ""næsten uundgåeligt"", at han ville komme i fængsel."
mt: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and ended on August 3. The host, who was arrested on the spot, denied the attack and claimed that he used the stick to protect himself against bottles, which up to 30 people threw at him. Blake was also convicted of attempting to obstruct the course of justice. The judge told Blake that it was ""almost inevitable"" that he would go to prison."
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Andre emner på dagsorden i Bali omfatter at redde verdens resterende skove, og delingen af teknologier til at hjælpe udviklingslande med at vokse på mindre forurenende måder. FN håber også på at kunne færdiggøre en fond, der skal hjælpe lande, der er ramt af den globale opvarmning, med at klare konsekvenserne. Pengene kan bruges til oversvømmelsessikring af huse, bedre håndtering af vand og diversificering af afgrøderne.
mt: Other items on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing countries grow in less polluting ways. The UN also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries hit by global warming cope with the consequences. The money can be used to flood-proof homes, better manage water and diversify crops.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: "Nigeria meldte tidligere ud, at de planlagde at slutte sig til AfCFTA i ugen før topmødet. Den afrikanske Unionskommissær for handel og industri, Albert Muchanga, meddelte, at Benin ville deltage. Kommissæren sagde: ""Vi har endnu ikke aftalt oprindelsesregler og toldaftaler, men de rammer vi har, er nok til at begynde at handle den 1. juli 2020""."
mt: "Nigeria announced earlier that they planned to join the AfCFTA the week before the summit. The African Union's Commissioner for Trade and Industry, Albert Muchanga, announced that Benin would participate. The commissioner said: ""We have not yet agreed on origin rules and customs agreements, but the rules we have are enough to start trading on July 1, 2020."""
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: "Nigeria meldte tidligere ud, at de planlagde at slutte sig til AfCFTA i ugen før topmødet. Den afrikanske Unionskommissær for handel og industri, Albert Muchanga, meddelte, at Benin ville deltage. Kommissæren sagde: ""Vi har endnu ikke aftalt oprindelsesregler og toldaftaler, men de rammer vi har, er nok til at begynde at handle den 1. juli 2020""."
mt: "Nigeria announced earlier that they planned to join the AfCFTA the week before the summit. The African Union's Commissioner for Trade and Industry, Albert Muchanga, announced that Benin would participate. The commissioner said: ""We have not yet agreed on origin rules and customs agreements, but the rules we have are enough to start trading on July 1, 2020."""
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Hun blev i løbet af sin tid i Atlanta rost af anmeldere og blev kendt for innovativ urban uddannelse. I 2009 blev hun tildelt titlen som National Superintendent of the Year. Da præmien blev uddelt, havde skolerne i Atlanta oplevet en stor forbedring af testresultaterne. Kort tid efter udgav The Atlanta Journal-Constitution en rapport, som påpegede problemer med testresultater. Rapporten viste, at prøvekaraktererne steg i en utrolig fart, og at skolen opdagede problemerne internt, men ikke reagerede på det de fandt. Beviser indikerede herefter, at testpapirer var blevet manipuleret. Hall blev sammen med 34 andre uddannelsesembedsmænd tiltalt i 2013.
mt: She was praised by reviewers during her time in Atlanta for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. When the award was given, schools in Atlanta had experienced a significant improvement in test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report that highlighted problems with test scores. The report showed that test scores had risen at an incredible rate, and that the school had discovered the problems internally, but did not react to what they found. Evidence then showed that test papers had been tampered with. Hall was charged along with 34 other education officials in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: En af bomberne sprang uden for generalguvernørens kontor. Yderligere tre bomber eksploderede i nærheden af regeringsbygninger på to timer. Nogle rapporter hævder, at det officielle dødstal er otte, og officielle rapporter bekræfter, at op til 30 mennesker kom til skade; men de endelige tal kendes endnu ikke.
mt: One of the bombs exploded outside the governor's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings over two hours. Some reports claim the official death toll is eight, and official reports confirm up to 30 people were injured; but the final numbers are still unknown.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: Den 21-årige Jesus sluttede sig til Manchester City sidste år i januar 2017 fra den brasilianske klub Palmeiras til en rapporteret pris på 27 millioner pund. Siden dengang har brasilianeren spillet 53 kampe for klubben, i alle ligaer, og har scoret 24 mål.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from the Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported price of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has played 53 games for the club, in all leagues, and has scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: Et vandrehjem kollapsede i Mekka, Islams hellige by, omkring kl. 10 i morges lokal tid. En del pilgrimme, som kom for at besøge den hellige by på aftenen for Hajj-pilgrimsfærden, boede i bygningen. Størstedelen af vandrehjemmets gæster var statsborgere fra De Forenede Arabiske Emirater. Dødstallet er mindst 15, et tal der forventes at stige.
mt: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam, around 10 am local time. Some pilgrims who came to visit the holy city on the eve of the Hajj pilgrimage were staying in the building. Most of the hostel's guests were citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a number expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Satellitterne, som begge vejede over 1.000 pund og bevægede sig med omkring 17.500 mil i timen, kolliderede 491 mil over Jorden. Forskere siger, at eksplosionen, der blev forårsaget af kollisionen, var enorm. De prøver stadig at afgøre, hvor stort styrtet var, og hvordan Jorden vil blive påvirket. Vragdelene bliver sporet af den strategiske kommando i det amerikanske forsvarsministerium. Resultatet fra planlægningsanalysen vil blive lagt ud på et offentligt websted.
mt: The satellites, both weighing over 1,000 pounds and moving at about 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Researchers say the explosion caused by the collision was enormous. They are still trying to determine how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The debris will be tracked by the strategic command of the U.S. Defense Department. The results of the planning analysis will be posted on a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Batten var med en anslået formue på 2,3 milliarder $ nummer 190 på ranglisten over de 400 rigeste amerikanere i 2008. Han dimitterede fra College of Arts & Sciences fra University of Virginia i 1950 og var en betydelig bidragsyder til institutionen.
mt: Batten was estimated to be worth $2.3 billion in 2008, ranking 190th on the list of the 400 richest Americans. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences at the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to the institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: "Californiens guvernør Arnold Schwarzenegger underskrev et lovforslag, der forbyder salg eller udlejning af voldelige computerspil til mindreårige. Lovforslaget ønsker, at voldelige videospil, som sælges i staten Californien, mærkes med en mærkat med ""18"" og gør salg til mindreårige strafbart med en bøde på 1000$ pr. overtrædelse."
mt: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a ""18"" rating and makes the sale to minors a misdemeanor punishable by a fine of $1,000 per violation."
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: "Duvall, som er gift og har to voksne børn, gjorde ikke et stort indtryk på Miller, som historien var relateret til. Da Miller blev bedt om en kommentar, sagde han: ""Mike taler meget under høringen... jeg var ved at gøre mig klar, så jeg lyttede ikke rigtigt til hvad han sagde."""
mt: "Duvall, who is married and has two adult children, did not make much of an impression on Miller, who the story was related to. When Miller was asked for a comment, he said: ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing... I was getting ready, so I wasn't really listening to what he said."""
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: "Premierminister Stephen Harper har, efter det 25-minutter lange møde tirsdag med NDPs leder Jack Layton på ministerens kontor, indvilliget i at sende regeringens 'Clean Air Act' til gennemgang hos et udvalg med medlemmer fra alle partier før andenbehandlingen. Layton havde bedt om ændringer til de konservatives miljølovforslag under mødet med statsministeren, hvor han bad om en ""grundig og komplet omskrivning"" af det konservative partis miljølovforslag. Lige siden den føderale regering trådte til og overtog finansieringen af Mersey hospitalet i Devonport, Tasmanien, har statens regering og nogle føderale parlamentsmedlemmer kritiseret handlingen som et stunt i optakten til det føderale valg, som afholdes i november. Men premierminister John Howard har udtalt, at handlingen kun havde til formål at beskytte hospitalets faciliteter imod at blive nedgraderet af den tasmanske regering ved at give yderligere 45 millioner AUD$."
mt: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has, after a 25-minute meeting Tuesday with NDP leader Jack Layton in the minister's office, agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to a committee with members from all parties before second reading. Layton had asked for changes to the Conservative Party's environmental bill during the meeting with the prime minister, where he asked for a ""thorough and complete rewrite"" of the Conservative Party's environmental bill. Since the federal government took over funding for Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, federal government and some federal parliament members have criticized the move as a stunt in the lead-up to the federal election, which is held in November. But Prime Minister John Howard has stated that the move was only to protect the hospital's facilities from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government by giving an additional $45 million AUD."
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Både cyanursyre og melamin blev fundet i urinprøver fra kæledyr, der døde efter at have indtaget forurenet kæledyrsfoder. Forskere på universitetet sagde, at de to forbindelser reagerer med hinanden for at danne krystaller, der kan blokere nyrefunktionen. Forskerne opdagede, at der blev dannet krystaller i katteurin, når de tilsatte melamin og cyanursyre. Sammensætningen af krystallerne matcher dem, der er fundet i urinen fra berørte kæledyr, når der sammenlignes via infrarød spektroskopi (FTIR).
mt: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after eating tainted pet food. Researchers at the university said the two compounds react with each other to form crystals that can block kidney function. Researchers found that crystals formed in cat urine when they added melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of the crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared via infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: "Xinhua rapporterede, at regeringens efterforskere fandt to ""sort boks"" flyoptagere i onsdags. Andre brydere hyldede også Luna. Tommy Dreamer sagde ""Luna var den første dronning af Extreme. Min første manager. Luna døde på natten med to måner. Ret enestående, ligesom hende selv. Stærk kvinde."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels kommenterede, at ""Luna var så vild som mig... måske endnu mere... elsker hende og kommer til at savne hende... forhåbentlig er hun et bedre sted nu."""
mt: "Xinhua reported that the government's investigators found two "black box" flight recorders on Wednesday. Other cutters also honored Luna. Tommy Dreamer said, "Luna was the first queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna died at night with two moons. Uniquely, like herself. Strong woman." Dustin "Goldust" Runnels commented that "Luna was as wild as me... maybe even more... I love her and will miss her... hopefully she is a better place now."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Selvom der var tre personer i huset, da bilen ramte det, kom ingen af dem til skade. Chaufføren pådrog sig dog alvorlige kvæstelser i hovedet. Vejen, hvor ulykken fandt sted, blev lukket midlertidigt, mens redningstjenesterne befriede føreren fra den røde Audi TT. Han blev i første omgang indlagt på James Paget Hospital i Great Yarmouth. Han blev efterfølgende overflyttet til Addenbrooke's Hospital i Cambridge.
mt: Although there were three people in the house when the car hit it, none of them were injured. The driver sustained serious head injuries in the crash. The road where the accident occurred was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially admitted to James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was later transferred to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: Kampene startede kl. 10:00 med fantastisk vejr, og bortset fra en smule kortvarig støvregn hen på formiddagen, så var det en perfekt dag til syvmandsrugby. Sydafrika, der ligger på toppen i turneringen, startede på den rigtige måde, da de fik en komfortabel 26 - 00 sejr over Zambia, der ligger på 5. pladsen. Selvom de bestemt så rustne ud i kampen mod deres modstandere, forbedrede Sydafrika sig dog stadig som turneringen skred frem. Deres disciplinerede forsvar, boldhåndteringsevner og fremragende teamwork fik dem til at skille sig ud, og det var tydeligt, at dette var holdet, der skulle slås.
mt: The matches started at 10:00 with fantastic weather, and apart from a little bit of short-lived dust rain in the morning, it was a perfect day for seven-a-side rugby. South Africa, who are at the top of the tournament, started in the right way, as they got a comfortable 26 - 0 win over Zambia, who are in fifth place. Although they certainly looked rusty in the match against their opponents, South Africa did however improve as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defense, ball handling skills and excellent teamwork stood out, and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Kampene startede kl. 10:00 med fantastisk vejr, og bortset fra en smule kortvarig støvregn hen på formiddagen, så var det en perfekt dag til syvmandsrugby. Sydafrika, der ligger på toppen i turneringen, startede på den rigtige måde, da de fik en komfortabel 26 - 00 sejr over Zambia, der ligger på 5. pladsen. Selvom de bestemt så rustne ud i kampen mod deres modstandere, forbedrede Sydafrika sig dog stadig som turneringen skred frem. Deres disciplinerede forsvar, boldhåndteringsevner og fremragende teamwork fik dem til at skille sig ud, og det var tydeligt, at dette var holdet, der skulle slås.
mt: The matches started at 10:00 with fantastic weather, and apart from a little bit of short-lived dust rain in the morning, it was a perfect day for seven-a-side rugby. South Africa, who are at the top of the tournament, started in the right way, as they got a comfortable 26 - 0 win over Zambia, who are in fifth place. Although they certainly looked rusty in the match against their opponents, South Africa did however improve as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defense, ball handling skills and excellent teamwork stood out, and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: I løbet af de sidste tre årtier har Kina udviklet en markedsøkonomi, selvom landet officielt stadig er en kommunistisk stat. De første økonomiske reformer blev foretaget under Deng Xiaopings ledelse. Siden dengang er Kinas størrelse ud fra et økonomisk perspektiv vokset 90 gange. For første gang sidste år eksporterede Kina flere biler end Tyskland, og de overgik også USA som det største marked i denne industri. Kinas BNP kan blive større end USAs inden for to årtier.
mt: In the last three decades, China has developed a market economy, although the country is still officially a communist state. The first economic reforms were made under Deng Xiaoping's leadership. Since then, China's size from an economic perspective has grown 90 times. For the first time last year, China exported more cars than Germany, and they also surpassed the United States as the largest market in this industry. China's GDP can become larger than the United States within two decades.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: """Vi vil bestræbe os på at reducere kuldioxidemissionerne pr. BNP-enhed med en bemærkelsesværdig margen inden 2020 i forhold til niveauet i 2005"", sagde Hu. Han satte ikke et tal på nedskæringerne og sagde, at de ville være baseret på Kinas økonomiske produktion. Hu opmuntrede ulande ""til at undgå den traditionelle adfærd om at forurene først og  rydde op senere."" Han tilføjede dog, at ""de ikke bør blive bedt om at påtage sig forpligtelser, som går ud over deres udviklingsniveau, ansvar og formåen."""
mt: """We will strive to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a remarkable margin by 2020 compared to the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the reductions and said they would be based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""not to adopt the traditional approach of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added, however, that ""they should not be asked to take on responsibilities that go beyond their level of development, capacity and ability.""
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: "Den medicinske velgørenhedsorganisation Mangola, Læger uden Grænser samt Verdenssundhedsorganisationen udtaler, at det er det værste udbrud som hidtil er set i landet. Talsmand for Læger uden grænser Richard Veerman sagde: ""Angola er på vej til det værste udbrud nogensinde, og situationen er fortsat meget vanskelig i landet""."
mt: "The medical charity Mangola, Doctors Without Borders and the World Health Organization state that it is the worst outbreak ever seen in the country. A spokesman for Doctors Without Borders Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is on its way to the worst outbreak ever, and the situation is still very difficult in the country."""
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Direktøren for anklagemyndigheden, Kier Starmer QC, udtalte sig i morges om retsforfølgelsen af både Huhne og Pryce. Huhne er trådt tilbage og vil blive erstattet i Kabinettet af MP Ed Davey. MP Norman Lamb forventes at overtage jobbet som handelsminister, som Davey forlader. Huhne og Pryce skal møde i Westminster Magistratetes Court den 16 . februar.
mt: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Keir Starmer QC, spoke this morning about the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and will be replaced in the Cabinet by MP Ed Davey. MP Norman Lamb is expected to take over the job as Trade Minister, which Davey is leaving. Huhne and Pryce are due to appear in Westminster Magistrates' Court on 16 February.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: "Historien, der bliver præsenteret i den franske opera af Camille Saint-Saens, handler om en kunstner ""hvis liv er dikteret af en kærlighed til stoffer og Japan."" Som resultat heraf ryger kunstnerne cannabisjoints på scenen, og selve teatret opfordrer publikum til at deltage."
mt: "The story presented in the French opera by Camille Saint-Saens is about an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love of drugs and Japan."" As a result, artists smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theater itself encourages the audience to participate."
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: "Den kendte ""kosmonaut nr. 11"", Leonov, var en del af det oprindelige kosmonaut-team i Sovjetunionen. Den 18. marts 1965 gennemførte han den første bemandede ekstra-vehikulære aktivitet (EVA), eller  ""rumvandring"", og opholdt sig alene uden for rumfartøjet i lige over tolv minutter. For sit arbejde modtog han ordenen ""Sovjetunionens helt"", som er Sovjetunionens største udmærkelse. Ti år senere ledte han den sovjetiske del af Apollo–Soyuz-missionen som symbol på, at  rumkapløbet var slut."
mt: "The well-known ""cosmonaut number 11"", Leonov, was part of the original cosmonaut team in the Soviet Union. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extra-vehicular activity (EVA), or ""space walk"", and remained alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. For his work he received the order ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", which is the Soviet Union's highest award. Ten years later he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission as a symbol that the space race was over."
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: "Efter ulykken blev Gibson bragt til et hospital, men døde kort tid efter. Lastbilchaufføren, som er 64, blev ikke såret ved ulykken. Køretøjet i sig selv blev fjernet fra ulykkesstedet, cirka klokken 12:00 GMT samme dag. En ansat på et værksted tæt på ulykkesstedet fortalte: ""Der var børn, som ventede på at krydse vejen, og de skreg og græd alle sammen."" De løb alle tilbage fra det sted, hvor ulykken fandt sted."
mt: "After the accident Gibson was taken to a hospital, but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is 64, was not injured in the accident. The vehicle itself was removed from the accident scene, around noon GMT the same day. An employee at a nearby workshop told: ""There were children waiting to cross the road, and they screamed and cried all of them."" They all ran back from the place where the accident happened."
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Det udførte arbejde var for det meste teoretisk, men programmet blev designet til at simulere observationer af SagDEG galaksen. Effekten, som holdet ledte efter, ville være et resultat af tidevandslignende kræfter mellem galaksens mørke stof og Mælkevejens mørke stof. Ligesom Månen udøver et træk på jorden og forårsager tidevand, ligeså udøver Mælkevejen en kraft på galaksen SagDEG . Forskerne kunne konkludere, at det mørke stof påvirker andet mørkt stof på samme måde, som almindeligt stof gør. Denne teori siger, at det meste mørke stof omkring en galakse, findes rundt om galaksen i en slags ring og består af masser af små partikler.
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but the program was designed to simulate observations of the SagDEG galaxy. The effect that the team was looking for would be a result of tidal-like forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just as the Moon exerts a pull on Earth and causes tides, so does the Milky Way exert a pull on the SagDEG galaxy. Researchers could conclude that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way that ordinary matter does. This theory says that most of the dark matter around a galaxy is found around the galaxy in a sort of ring and consists of masses of small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: "Debatten om de midler, der blev brugt til nødhjælp og genopbygning i kølvandet på orkanen Katrina, opstod på grund af de kontroverser, som nogle finanspolitiske konservative humoristisk har stemplet ""Bushs New Orleans-aftale."" Liberal kritik af genopbygningsindsatsen har fokuseret på tildelingen af genopbygningskontrakter til betragtede Washington-insidere."
mt: "The debate over the funds used for relief and reconstruction in the wake of Hurricane Katrina arose from the controversies some financial conservative humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans deal." Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to well-connected Washington insiders."
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: "Når kapslen kommer til Jorden og kommer ind i atmosfæren, cirka kl. 05:00 (østlig tid), forventes det at lave noget af et lysshow for folk, der bor i det nordlige Californien, Oregon, Nevada og Utah. Kapslen kommer til at se ud som et stjerneskud, der går over himlen. Kapslen bevæger sig med cirka 12,8 km i sekundet, eller 8 mil i sekundet, hvilket er hurtigt nok til at komme fra San Francisco til Los Angeles på blot ét minut. Stardust vil sætte en ny historisk rekord ved at være det hurtigste rumfartøj til at returnere til Jorden, hvorved det bryder den tidligere rekord, der blev sat i 1969, da Apollo X kommandomodulet returnerede. ""Det vil bevæge sig henover vestkysten i det nordlige Californien og vil oplyse himlen fra Californien gennem det centrale Oregon og videre gennem Nevada og Idaho samt ind i Utah."" fortalte Tom Duxbury, Stardusts projektchef."
mt: "When the capsule comes to Earth and comes into the atmosphere, around 5:00 a.m. (PST), it is expected to make something of a light show for people who live in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah. The capsule will look like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule is moving at about 12.8 kilometers per second, or 8 miles per second, which is fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in just one minute. Stardust will set a new historical record by being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in 1969, when the Apollo X command module returned. ""It will move over the west coast in Northern California and will illuminate the sky from California through Central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah."" Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager, said.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: En læge, der arbejdede på Children's Hospital i Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, vil blive sigtet for groft mord, efter at hendes mor blev fundet død i bagagerummet på hendes bil onsdag, siger myndighederne i Ohio. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, blev fundet i Blue Ash, Ohio, en forstad cirka 15 mil nord for Cincinnati, hvor han lå på jorden ved siden af vejen, i en t-shirt og underbukser, i en tilsyneladende stærkt medicineret tilstand.. Hun ledte betjentene til sin sorte Oldsmobile Intrigue, som befandt sig 500 fod væk. Der fandt de liget af 53-årige Saroja Balasubramanian dækket af blodplettede tæpper. Politiet udtalte, at liget tilsyneladende havde ligget der omkring et døgn.
mt: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, will be charged with gross homicide, after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb about 15 miles north of Cincinnati, where she lay on the ground next to the road, in a T-shirt and boxer shorts, in an apparently heavily medicated state. She led police to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue, which was 500 feet away. There they found the body of 53-year-old Saroja Balasubramanian covered in bloodstained towels. Police said the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: Det er den største erhvervelse i eBays historie. Virksomheden håber at diversificere dens profitkilder og opnå popularitet i områder, hvor Skype har en stærk position såsom Kina, Østeuropa og Brasilien.
mt: It is the largest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit streams and gain popularity in areas where Skype has a strong position such as China, Eastern Europe and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
