src: Indtil nu har AOL kunnet flytte og udvikle IM-markedet i sit eget tempo, på grund af programmets udbredthed i USA. Med denne ordning på plads, kunne denne frihed ende. Det samlede antal brugere af tjenester fra Yahoo! og Microsoft vil konkurrere om antallet af AOL's kunder.
mt: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market in its own time, due to the program's prevalence in the United States. With this agreement in place, this freedom may end. The combined number of users of services from Yahoo! and Microsoft will compete for the number of AOL's customers.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: En bilbombe detonerede ved politiets hovedkvarter i Gaziantep, Tyrkiet, i går morges og dræbte to politibetjente og sårede mere end tyve andre personer. Guvernørens kontor sagde, at nitten af de sårede var politifolk. Politiet udtalte, at de mistænker en antaget tilhænger af Daesh (ISIS) for at være ansvarlig for angrebet.
mt: A car bomb detonated outside the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, this morning and killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect a suspected ISIS supporter for being responsible for the attack.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Mitt Romney, Massachusetts' tidligere guvernør, vandt tirsdag det Republikanske Partis primærvalg i Florida med over 46 procent af stemmerne. Tidligere formand for Repræsentanternes Hus, Newt Gingrich, kom på andenpladsen med 32 procent. Som vinderen tager det hele-stat gav Florida alle sine halvtreds delegerede til Romney og gjorde ham til det republikanske partis førende kandidat.
mt: Former Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney won Tuesday's Republican Party primary in Florida with over 46 percent of the vote. Former Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As the winner, Florida awarded all its 50 delegates to Romney and made him the leading Republican candidate.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: "Tidligere formand for Repræsentanternes Hus Newt Gingrich, Texas' guvernør Rick Perry, og kongresmedlem Michele Bachmann kom på henholdsvis fjerde-, femte- og sjettepladsen. Efter at have set resultaterne roste Gingrich Santorum, men han havde hårde ord tilovers for Romney, på hvis vegne negative kampagnereklamer mod Gingrich var blevet vist i Iowa. Perry sagde, at han ville ""vende tilbage til Texas for at vurdere resultaterne fra aftenens valgmøde, og afgøre om der er en vej frem for mig selv i dette løb"", men sagde dog senere, at han ville forblive i løbet og konkurrere i det primære valg i South Carolina den 21. januar. Bachmann, der vandt Ames Straw Poll i august, besluttede sig for at afslutte sin kampagne."
mt: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann came in fourth, fifth, and sixth place. After seeing the results, Gingrich praised Santorum, but had harsh words for Romney, whose negative campaign ads against Gingrich had been shown in Iowa. Perry said he would "return to Texas to consider the results of tonight's caucus and decide if there is a path forward for me in this race," but later said he would remain in the race and compete in the South Carolina primary on January 21. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: "Stationens hjemmeside beskriver showet som ""gammeldags radioteater med et nyt og skandaløst, nørdet spin!"" I dets tidlige dage blev showet udelukkende præsenteret på den gamle internetradio TogiNet Radio, som er en hjemmeside med fokus på taleradio. I slutningen af 2015 etablerede TogiNet datterselskabet AstroNet Radio. Showet havde oprindeligt amatør-stemmeskuespillere, der havde oprindelse i det østlige Texas."
mt: "The station's website describes the show as ""old-fashioned radio theater with a new and scandalous, nerdy spin!"" In its early days, the show was exclusively presented on the old internet radio TogiNet Radio, which is a website focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established the subsidiary AstroNet Radio. The show originally had amateur voice actors with origins in eastern Texas."
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Den 26. november 2008 ankom angrebsmændene til Mumbai med båd. De bar granater og automatvåben og ramte flere mål, herunder den overfyldte jernbanestation Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus og det berømte Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headleys afsøgning og informationsindsamling havde bidraget til at gøre det muligt for de 10 bevæbnede mænd fra den pakistanske militante gruppe Laskhar-e-Taiba at udføre deres mission. Angrebet lagde et stort pres på forholdet mellem Indien og Pakistan.
mt: 26 November 2008, the attackers arrived in Mumbai by boat. They carried grenades and automatic weapons and hit several targets, including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's investigation and information gathering had made it possible for the 10 armed men from the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba to carry out their mission. The attack put a lot of pressure on the relationship between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: "Nadals mand-til-mand rekord mod canadieren er 7–2. Han tabte for nylig til Raonic i Brisbane Open. Nadal scorede 88% af de samlede point i kampen og vandt 76% af sine førsteserver. Efter kampen udtalte Lerets Konge: ""Jeg er bare glad for at være tilbage i de sidste runder af de vigtigste begivenheder. Jeg er her for at vinde."""
mt: "The man-to-man Christmas record against the Canadian is 7–2. He lost recently to Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal scored 88% of the total points in the match and won 76% of his first serves. After the match, the King of Letret said: ""I'm just glad to be back in the last rounds of the most important events. I'm here to win."""
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: Sidste uge meddelte Naked News, at de ville øge deres internationale sprogmandat til nyhedsrapportering markant med tre nye udsendelser. Den globale organisation, der allerede rapporterer på engelsk og japansk, lancerer spanske, italienske og koreanske programmer til fjernsyn, internet og mobile enheder.
mt: Last week, Naked News announced that it would significantly increase its international language mandate for news reporting with three new broadcasts. The global organization, which already reports in English and Japanese, launches Spanish, Italian and Korean programs for television, internet and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Udover onsdagens begivenhed konkurrerede Carpanedo i to individuelle løb ved mesterskabet. Hendes første var slalom, hvor hun ikke fuldførte sit første løb. 36 af de 116 deltagere fik samme resultat i løbet. I hendes andet løb, som var storslalom, sluttede hun på tiendepladsen i kvindernes siddende gruppe med en samlet løbetid på 4:41,30. 2:11,60 minutter langsommere end kvinden på førstepladsen, østrigske Claudia Loesch, og 1:09,02 minutter langsommere end Gyöngyi Dani fra Ungarn, som sluttede på niendepladsen. Fire skiløbere i kvindernes gruppe for siddende udøvere gennemførte ikke løbet, og 45 ud af i alt 117 skiløbere i storslalom rangerede ikke i ræset.
mt: In addition to Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual events at the championship. Her first was slalom, where she did not complete her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in the run. In her second run, which was giant slalom, she finished tenth in the women's sitting group with a total run time of 4:41.30. 2:11.60 minutes slower than the woman in first place, Austrian Claudia Loesch, and 1:09.02 minutes slower than Gyöngyi Dani from Hungary, who finished in ninth place. Four skiers in the women's group for sitting competitors did not complete the run, and 45 out of a total of 117 skiers in giant slalom were not ranked in the race.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: Onsdag satte USAs National Basketball Association (NBA) sin professionelle basketball-sæson på pause på grund af bekymringer relateret til COVID-19. NBAs beslutning kom efter, at en spiller for Utah Jazz testede positiv for COVID-19 virussen.
mt: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) put its professional basketball season on pause due to concerns related to COVID-19. The NBA's decision came after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for the COVID-19 virus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: Dagens spiller er, i dag, Alex Ovechkin fra Washington Capitals. Han lavede 2 mål og 2 målgivende afleveringer i Washingtons 5-3 sejr over Atlanta Thrashers. Aftenens første assist for Ovechkins var på det kampvindende mål af debutanten Nicklas Backstrom; hans andet mål denne aften var hans 60. i denne sæson, og han blev den første spiller som har scoret 60 eller flere mål i en sæson siden 1995-96, da Jaromir Jagr og Mario Lemieux begge nåede den milepæl.
mt: Today's player is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He scored two goals and two assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, making him the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux both reached the milestone.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: "Northern Rock-banken var blevet nationaliseret i 2008 efter afsløringen af at virksomheden havde modtaget nødhjælp fra den britiske regering. Northern Rock krævede støtte på grund af sin eksponering under subprime-krisen i 2007. Sir Richard Bransons Virgin Group fik et bud på banken afvist forud for bankens nationalisering. I forbindelse med nationaliseringen i 2010 blev den nuværende centrale bank Nothern Rock plc separeret fra den 'dårlige bank' Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin har kun købt den ""gode bank"" i Northern Rocks, og ikke kapitalforvaltningsselskabet."
mt: "Northern Rock bank was nationalized in 2008 after the revelation that the company had received emergency assistance from the British government. Northern Rock demanded support due to its exposure under the subprime crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank's nationalization. In connection with the nationalization in 2010, the current central bank Northern Rock plc was separated from the "bad bank" Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin has only bought the "good bank" in Northern Rock, and not the capital management company."
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Mr. Rudds beslutning om at underskrive Kyoto-protokollen isolerer USA, som nu vil være det eneste i-land, der ikke ratificerer aftalen. Australiens tidligere konservative regering nægtede at ratificere Kyoto og sagde, at det ville skade økonomien som i høj grad er afhængig af kuleksport, mens lande som Indien og Kina ikke var bundet af emissionsmål.
mt: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto Protocol isolates the United States, which will now be the only non-signatory country. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto and said it would hurt the economy, which is largely dependent on coal exports, while countries such as India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Mr. Rudds beslutning om at underskrive Kyoto-protokollen isolerer USA, som nu vil være det eneste i-land, der ikke ratificerer aftalen. Australiens tidligere konservative regering nægtede at ratificere Kyoto og sagde, at det ville skade økonomien som i høj grad er afhængig af kuleksport, mens lande som Indien og Kina ikke var bundet af emissionsmål.
mt: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto Protocol isolates the United States, which will now be the only non-signatory country. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto and said it would hurt the economy, which is largely dependent on coal exports, while countries such as India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Skytter i det supplerende skadedyrsbekæmpelsesforsøg skulle følges tæt af parkbetjentene, da forsøget var overvåget og dets virkning blev evalueret. I et partnerskab mellem NPWS og Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc blev kvalificerede frivillige rekrutteret under Sporting Shooters Associations jagtprogram. Ifølge Mick O'Flynn, den fungerende direktør for naturbevarelse og kulturarv i NPWS, modtog de fire skytter, der var valgt til den første skydeoperation, omfattende sikkerheds- og træningsinstruktion.
mt: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely followed by park rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership between NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the acting director of nature and heritage in NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: "Med udgangspunkt i dette fossil betyder det, at splittelsen skete meget tidligere end man havde forventet ud fra det molekylære bevismateriale. ""Det betyder, at alt skal lægges tilbage,"" sagde forsker ved Rift Valley Research Service i Etiopien og medforfatter på studiet Berhane Asfaw."
mt: "Based on this fossil, it means that the split happened much earlier than we had expected from the molecular evidence. ""It means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and co-author of the study Berhane Asfaw."
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: På torsdagens hovedpræsentation ved Tokyo Game Show afslørede Nintendos præsident Satoru Iwata designet på controlleren til virksomhedens nye Nintendo Revolution-konsol. Controlleren, som ligner en fjernsynsfjernbetjening, bruger to sensorer der er placeret nær brugerens fjernsyn, til at triangulere sin position i et tre-dimensionelt område. Dette vil gøre det muligt for spillere at styre handlinger og bevægelser i computerspil ved at bevæge enheden gennem luften.
mt: On Thursday's keynote presentation at Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo President Satoru Iwata unveiled the design of the controller for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. The controller, which resembles a television remote, uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate his position in a three-dimensional area. This will allow players to control actions and movements in computer games by moving the device through the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Tidligere rapporterede det kinesiske nyhedsbureau Xinhua, at et fly var blevet kapret. Senere rapporter meddelte så, at flyet modtog en bombetrussel og blev omdirigeret tilbage til Afghanistan, hvor det landede i Kandahar. De tidlige rapporter siger, at flyet blev omdirigeret tilbage til Afghanistan efter at være blevet nægtet tilladelse til nødlanding i Ürümqi.
mt: Earlier, the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported that a plane had been hijacked. Later reports said the plane received a bomb threat and was redirected back to Afghanistan, where it landed in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was redirected back to Afghanistan after being denied permission to land in Ürümqi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: "Mandag fortalte Sara Danius, permanent sekretær for Nobelkomiteen for litteratur ved det Svenske Akademi, offentligt i et radioprogram på Sveriges Radio i Sverige, at komiteen ikke havde været i stand til at få direkte kontakt med Bob Dylan i forbindelse med, at han vandt Nobelprisen i litteratur i 2016, og havde opgivet at prøve at få kontakt med ham. Danius sagde: ""Lige nu gør vi ingenting. Jeg har ringet og sendt e-mails til hans nærmeste samarbejdspartner og modtaget meget venlige svar. Det er helt sikkert nok for nu."""
mt: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, told publicly in a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden, that the committee had not been able to get direct contact with Bob Dylan in connection with him winning the Nobel Prize in Literature in 2016, and had given up trying to get in touch with him. Danius said: ""Right now we're doing nothing. I've called and sent e-mails to his closest partner and received very polite answers. It's definitely enough for now."""
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: "Den amerikanske præsident, George W. Bush, tog godt imod meddelelsen. Bushs talsmand Gordon Johndroe kaldte Nordkoreas løfte ""et stort skridt frem mod målet om at opnå beviselig atomafrustning af den koreanske halvø."""
mt: "The American president, George W. Bush, welcomed the news. Bush's spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a big step forward toward the goal of verifiably ending North Korea's nuclear weapons program.""
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: "I 1956 flyttede Słania til Sverige, hvor han tre år senere begyndte at arbejde for det svenske postvæsen og blev deres chefgravør. Han producerede over 1.000 frimærker til Sverige og 28 andre lande. Hans arbejde er af en sådan kvalitet og detaljegrad, at han er en af de meget få ""husstandsnavne"" blandt filatelister. Nogle specialiserer sig i bare at samle hans arbejde. Hans 1.000. frimærke var det storslåede ""Svenske kongers store gerninger"" af David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl fra 2000, som er vist i Guinness Rekordbog. Han var også involveret i indgraveringen af pengesedler i mange lande, nylige eksempler på hans arbejde er blandt andet portrætter af premierministre på forsiden af de nye canadiske 5$ og 100$ sedler."
mt: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began working for the Swedish postal service and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in just collecting his work. His 1,000th stamp was the grandiose ""Great Deeds of Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl from 2000, which is featured in the Guinness Book of Records. He was also involved in the engraving of banknotes in many countries, recent examples of his work are among others portraits of prime ministers on the front of the new Canadian 5$ and 100$ bills."
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: 800 mil af Trans-Alaska Pipeline Systemet blev lukket ned efter udslippet fra tusinder af tønder råolie syd for Fairbanks, Alaska. Et strømsvigt i forbindelse med en rutinemæssig test af brandkommandosystemet betød, at overtryksventiler åbnede sig, og råolie flød over tæt på Fort Greely pumpestation 9. Åbningen af ventilerne førte til en trykudløsning for systemet, og olie strømmede ud på en flade og videre til en tank, der kan rumme 55.000 tønder (2,3 millioner gallons). Onsdag eftermiddag var tankens ventiler stadig utætte sandsynligvis på grund af varmeudvidelsen inde i tanken. Et andet sekundært afspærringsområde under tankene, som kan rumme 104.500 tønder, var endnu ikke fyldt helt op.
mt: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System was shut down after a spill from thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power outage in connection with a routine test of the fire command system meant that overpressure valves opened, and crude oil flowed over near Fort Greely pump station 9. The opening of the valves led to a pressure drop in the system, and oil flowed out onto a pad and further into a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). Wednesday afternoon the tank's valves were still open likely due to the expansion of heat inside the tank. Another secondary containment area under the tanks, which can hold 104,500 barrels, was not yet filled up.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: Det amerikanske ingeniørkorps estimerede, at 6 tommer regn kunne ødelægge de diger, der tidligere var blevet beskadiget. Ninth Ward, der så oversvømmelser så høje som 20 fod da orkanen Katrina ramte, har i øjeblikket vand til taljehøjde, da den nærliggende dige blev oversvømmet. Vand spilder over diget i et afsnit, der er 100 fod bred.
mt: The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rain could destroy the levees that were previously damaged. Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet when Hurricane Katrina struck, currently has water up to the roofline, as the nearby levee was breached. Water is spilling over the levee in a 100-foot section.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton bekræftede, at Howard University Hospital havde indlagt patienten i stabil tilstand. Patienten havde været i Nigeria, hvor der har været nogle tilfælde af ebolavirus. Hospitalet har fulgt protokollen for infektionskontrol herunder separering af den smittede patient fra andre for at forhindre mulig smittespredning.
mt: Hamilton confirmed that Howard University Hospital had admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been in Nigeria, where there have been some cases of Ebola virus. The hospital has followed infection control protocols including separation of the infected patient from others to prevent possible spread of infection.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Kometer kan muligvis have været en kilde til vand på jorden sammen med organisk materiale, der kan danne proteiner og understøtte liv. Forskere håber at forstå, hvordan planeter formes, og særligt hvordan Jorden blev formet siden kometer kolliderede med Jorden for længe siden.
mt: Comets may have been a source of water on Earth along with organic material that can form proteins and support life. Researchers hope to understand how planets form, and especially how Earth was formed since comets collided with Earth long ago.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Mens myndighederne er usikre på truslens troværdighed, lukkede Maryland Transportation Authority sagen per opfordring fra FBI. Skraldebiler blev brugt til at blokere tunnelindgange, og 80 politibetjente var klar til at hjælpe med at omdirigere bilister. Der var ingen forsinkelser på grund af stærk trafik på ringvejen, som var byens alternative rute.
mt: While authorities are unsure of the threat's credibility, Maryland Transportation Authority closed the case per FBI request. Garbage trucks were used to block tunnel entrances, and 80 police officers were on standby to help reroute drivers. There were no delays due to heavy traffic on the beltway, the city's alternative route.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: "Fotografen blev kørt til Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, hvor han efterfølgende døde. Han var angiveligt i 20'erne. I en udtalelse sagde Bieber: ""selvom jeg ikke var til stede eller direkte involveret i denne tragiske ulykke, går mine tanker og bønner til ofrets familie."" Underholdningsnyhedssitet TMZ rapporterer, at fotografen stoppede sit køretøj på den modsatte side af Sepulveda Boulevard og prøvede at fotografere politistoppet, før han krydsede vejen og fortsatte, hvilket fik politibetjenten fra California Highway Patrol, der dirigere trafikstoppet, til at beordre ham til at komme tilbage to gange. Ifølge politiet, er det ikke sandsynligt, at føreren af køretøjet, som ramte fotografen, risikerer at blive retsforfulgt."
mt: "The photographer was taken to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he later died. He was reportedly in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said: "Although I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my prayers go out to the family of the victim, the driver of the car, and all of those who were involved. I would like to ask everyone to join me in praying for the welfare of the victim during this most difficult and tragic time." Entertainment news site TMZ reports that the photographer stopped his vehicle on the opposite side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to photograph the police stop, before crossing the street and continuing, which prompted the California Highway Patrol officer directing the traffic stop to order him to return twice. According to police, it is unlikely that the driver of the vehicle that struck the photographer will be criminally prosecuted."
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: "Arias er testet positiv for et mildt tilfælde af virussen, udtalte præsidentminister Rodrigo Arias. Præsidentens tilstand er stabil, men han vil være i hjemmeisolation i flere dage. Udover at jeg har feber og ondt i halsen, føler jeg mig frisk og klar til at udføre mit arbejde hjemmefra. ""Jeg forventer at vende tilbage til alle mine pligter på mandag,"" erklærede Arias."
mt: "Arias has tested positive for a mild case of the virus," said President Rodrigo Arias. The president's condition is stable, but he will be in home isolation for several days. In addition to having a fever and sore throat, I feel healthy and ready to do my work from home. "I expect to return to all my duties on Monday," said Arias.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: På sit højeste punkt nåede den tropiske cyklon Gonu, opkaldt efter en taske af palmeblade på Maldivernes sprog, en vindstyrke på 240 kilometer i timen (149 mil i timen). Tidligere i dag blæste vinden omkring 83 km/t, og det var meningen, at den ville blive svagere.
mt: At its peak, the tropical cyclone Gonu, named after a palm frond basket on the Maldives language, reached a wind speed of 240 kilometers per hour (149 miles per hour). Earlier in the day, the wind was blowing around 83 km/h, and it was intended to be weaker.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Rødvande forårsages af en usædvanligt høj koncentration af Karenia brevis, der er en naturligt forekommende enkeltcellet havorganisme. Naturlige faktorer kan krydses og skabe ideelle forhold, så forekomsten af denne alge kan stige drastisk i antal. Algerne producerer et neurotoksin, som kan lamme nerverne i både mennesker og fisk. Fisk dør ofte som følge af en stor koncentration af gift i vandene. Mennesker kan blive påvirket ved at indånde det forurenede vand, der føres gennem luften med vind og bølger.
mt: Red tides are caused by an unusually high concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can cross and create ideal conditions, so the occurrence of this algae can rise dramatically in number. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can paralyze nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die as a result of a large concentration of poison in the waters. Humans can be affected by inhaling the polluted water, which is carried through the air with wind and waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: "Felicia, som førhen var en kategori 4 storm på Saffir-Simpson orkanskalaen, svandt til en tropisk depression før den forsvandt tirsdag. Resterne af orkanen skabte regnbyger over de fleste af øerne, men der er endnu ikke rapporteret om skader eller oversvømmelser. Nedbøret, der nåede 6,34 inches på en måler på Oahu, blev beskrevet som ""gavnligt"". Noget af nedbøren var ledsaget af tordenvejr og hyppige lynnedslag."
mt: "Felicia, which had previously been a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson hurricane scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating on Tuesday. The remnants of the storm brought rain showers over most of the islands, but there have been no reports of damage or flooding. The rainfall, which reached 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as "beneficial." Some of the rain was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning strikes."
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Piquet Jr. havde en ulykke i Grand Prix i Singapore lige efter et tidligt pitstop til Fernando Alonso, hvilket fik sikkerhedsbilen ud. Da bilerne foran Alonso stoppede for at tanke op under følge af sikkerhedsbilen, rykkede han op i rækken og tog sejren. Piquet Jr. blev fyret efter Grand Prixet i Ungarn i 2009.
mt: Piquet Jr. had an accident in the Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop to Fernando Alonso, which brought out the safety car. As the cars in front of Alonso stopped to refuel under the safety car, he moved up the line and took the win. Piquet Jr. was fired after the Hungarian Grand Prix in 2009.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Et studie som torsdag blev offentliggjort i tidsskriftet Science berettede om dannelsen af en ny fugleart på de ecuadorianske Galápagosøer. Forskere fra Princeton University i USA og Uppsala Universitet i Sverige har rapporteret, at den nye art blev udviklet på blot to generationer, selvom man havde troet at denne proces skulle have taget meget længere tid på grund af parring mellem den endemiske Darwin-finke geospiza fortis og den invasive kaktusfinke geospiza conirostris.
mt: A study published in the journal Science on Thursday reported the formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorian Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported that the new species was developed in just two generations, although it was thought that this process would have taken much longer due to breeding between the endemic Darwin's finch Geospiza fortis and the invasive cactus finch Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Den kunstneriske begivenhed er også del af en kampagne lanceret af Bukarest Rådhus i et forsøg på at genoprette billedet af den rumænske hovedstad som en kreativ og farverig metropol. Byen bliver den første i Sydøsteuropa, der bliver vært for CowParade, der er verdens største offentlige kunstbegivenhed. Begivenheden finder sted mellem juni og august i år.
mt: The artistic event is also part of a campaign launched by the Bucharest City Hall in an attempt to restore the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colorful metropolis. Bucharest will be the first city in Southeast Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event. The event will take place between June and August this year.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: Flyet var på vej mod Irkutsk, og blev betjent af interne tropper. Der er oprettet en forespørgsel, og en undersøgelse vil blive sat i gang. Il-76 har været en vigtig komponent inden for både det russiske og det sovjetiske militær siden 1970'erne og havde allerede opdaget en alvorlig ulykke i Rusland sidste måned. Den 7. oktober løsrev en motor sig under afgang uden tilskadekomst. Rusland tilbageholdt for en kort stund Il-76-modeller efter denne ulykke.
mt: The aircraft was en route to Irkutsk, and was operated by the Russian Air Force. An investigation has been launched, and a request has been made. The Il-76 has been a key component within both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s and had already discovered a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7, a motor separated during takeoff without injury. Russia temporarily halted Il-76 models after this accident.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Før The Simpsons havde Simon arbejdet på flere programmer i forskellige stillinger. I løbet af 1980'erne arbejdede han på shows som Taxi, Sams bar og The Tracey Ullman Show. I 1989 var han med til at skabe The Simpsons sammen med Brooks og Groening og var ansvarlig for at hyre showets første hold forfattere. Selvom han forlod showet i 1993, forblev han filmproducer og modtog fortsat titusindvis af dollars i royalties hver sæson.
mt: Before The Simpsons, Simon worked on several programs in various positions. During the 1980s, he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracey Ullman Show. In 1989, he was involved in creating The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing staff. Although he left the show in 1993, he remained a film producer and continued to receive thousands of dollars in royalties each season.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluke skrev, at nogle parters arbejde for at holde kvinder ude af debatten om kvinders helbred ikke har været en succes. Hun nåede denne konklusion på grund af de mange positive kommentarer og opmuntringer, hun modtog fra både kvinder og mænd, som opfordrede til, at præventionsmidler bør ses som nødvendig medicin.
mt: Fluke wrote that some partners' work to keep women out of the discussion about women's health has not been successful. She reached this conclusion because of the many positive comments and encouragement she received from both women and men, who urged that preventive measures should be seen as necessary medicine.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: Det vil opføre sig som vand. Det er gennemsigtigt, helt ligesom vand er. Så hvis du stod ved kysten, kunne du se ned til, hvad der er af småsten eller snask på bunden. Så vidt vi ved, er der kun en planet der viser mere livskraft end Titan, og den hedder Jorden, ”tilføjede Stofan.
mt: It will behave like water. It's transparent, just like water is. So if you were standing at the coast, you could look down and see what's there in terms of pebbles or debris on the bottom. As far as we know, there's only one planet that shows more signs of life than Titan, and that's Earth, Stofan added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

As far as we know, there's only one planet that shows more signs of life than Titan, and that's Earth, Stofan added.

So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: Dette bekræfter ikke kun, at der i det mindste var nogle dinosaurer, der havde fjer, en teori der allerede er udbredt, det giver også detaljer, som fossiler generelt ikke kan, såsom farven og det tredimensionelle arrangement. . Forskere siger, at dette dyrs fjerdragt var kastanjebrun i toppen med en lys eller gulerodsfarvet underside. Fundet giver også indsigt i udviklingen af fjer hos fugle. Fordi dinosaurfjerene ikke har et veludviklet skaft, kaldet et fjerskaft, men har andre kendetegn fra fjer - stråler og bistråler - udledte forskerne, at fjerskaft sandsynligvis var en senere evolutionær udvikling end disse andre karakteristika. Fjernes struktur antyder, at de ikke blev brugt til flyvning, men snarere til temperaturregulering eller til pynt. Forskerne mente, at selvom dette er halen på en ung dinosaur, viser prøven en voksen fjerdragt og ikke en kyllings dun. Forskerne mener, at prøven fra halen på den unge dinosaur viser et voksent individs fjerdragt og ikke en kyllings dun.
mt: This confirms not only that there were at least some dinosaurs with feathers, a theory that is already widespread, it gives details that fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. Researchers say this creature's plumage was chestnut brown on top with a light or carrot-colored underside. The discovery also provides insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers lack a well-developed shaft, called a feather shaft, but have other feather characteristics - barbs and barbules - researchers deduced that feather shafts were likely a later evolutionary development than these other traits. The feather structure suggests that they were not used for flight, but rather for temperature regulation or decoration. Researchers said, although this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the specimen shows an adult plumage and not a chick's down. Researchers believe that the specimen from the tail of the young dinosaur shows an adult's plumage and not a chick's down.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Mens en forsøgsvaccine ser ud til at kunne reducere dødeligheden af ebola, har der indtil nu ikke været nogen lægemidler der har påvist, at de kan bruges til at behandle en eksisterende infektion. Antistof-blandingen ZMapp virkede først lovende på området, men formelle studier indikerede, at det var mindre effektivt end formodet til at forhindre dødsfald. I PALM-forsøget fungerede ZMapp som kontrol, hvilket betyder, at forskerne brugte den som en basislinje og sammenlignede de tre andre behandlinger med den.
mt: While an experimental vaccine appears to be able to reduce the mortality of Ebola, there have so far been no drugs that have been shown to be able to treat an existing infection. The antibody cocktail ZMapp initially appeared promising in the area, but formal studies indicated that it was less effective than expected in preventing deaths. In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control, meaning that researchers used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Mandag offentliggjorde forskere fra Stanford Universitys School of Medicine opfindelsen af et nyt diagnoseværktøj, som kan sortere celler efter type: en ganske lille printbar chip, som kan fremstilles med almindelige inkjetprintere, muligvis for omkring én US-cent stykket. Førende forskere siger, at dette kan medføre tidlig opdagelse af kræft, tuberkulose, HIV og malaria for patienter i lavindkomstlande, hvor overlevelsesraterne for sygdomme, såsom brystkræft, kan være halvdelen af dem fra rigere lande.
mt: On Monday, researchers from Stanford University's School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a very small printable chip that can be manufactured with ordinary inkjet printers, possibly for around one US-cent per piece. Leading researchers say this could lead to early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria for patients in low-income countries, where survival rates for diseases such as breast cancer can be half of those from wealthier countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Forskere har opdaget landformer på tværs af månens overflade, kaldet lobate kløfter, som tilsyneladende er resultater af, at månen skrumper ind meget langsomt. Disse skråninger blev fundet over hele månen og ser ud til at være forvitret minimalt, hvilket indikerer, at de geologiske hændelser, der skabte dem, fandt sted for nylig. Denne teori modstrider en påstand om, at der slet ikke findes geologisk aktivitet på månen.
mt: Researchers have discovered landforms across the moon's surface, called lobate escarpments, which apparently are results of the moon shrinking very slowly. These slopes were found across the moon and appear to have been eroded minimally, indicating that the geological events that created them occurred recently. This theory contradicts a claim that there is no geological activity on the moon.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: "Adekoya har siden været anklaget i Edinburgh Sheriff Court for at have myrdet sin søn. Hun er varetægtsfængslet og venter på at blive tiltalt og komme for retten, men bevismateriale fra øjenvidner kan være fejlbehæftet, fordi hendes billede er blevet offentliggjort bredt. Dette er almindelig praksis andre steder i Storbritannien, men skotske domstole fungerer anderledes, og domstolene har betragtet offentliggørelse af billeder som potentielt skadeligt. Professor Pamela Ferguson fra University of Dundee kommenterer, at ""det lader bestemt til at journalister skal passe på, hvis de offentliggør billeder af mistænkte o.l."" Crown Office, der har det overordnede ansvar for retsforfølgelse, har antydet over for journalister, at der ikke vil blive givet yderligere kommentarer, i det mindste indtil anklageskriftet foreligger."
mt: "Adekoya has since been charged in Edinburgh Sheriff Court for murdering her son. She is remanded in custody and awaits trial and to come before the court, but evidence from eyewitnesses can be flawed, because her image has been widely publicized. This is common practice elsewhere in Britain, but Scottish courts operate differently, and the courts have considered the publicizing of images as potentially harmful. Professor Pamela Ferguson from the University of Dundee comments, that ""it certainly seems that journalists should be careful if they publicize images of suspects etc."" Crown Office, which has the overall responsibility for prosecution, has indicated to journalists that there will be no further comments, at least until the indictment is available."
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: Ud over den altdominerende is har ekstreme vejrforhold hæmmet redningsindsatsen. Pittman antydede at forholdene ikke ville blive bedre før engang i næste uge. Ifølge Pittman er mængden samt tykkelsen af pakisen værre for sæljægere, end den har været de sidste 15 år.
mt: In addition to the overwhelming ice, extreme weather conditions have hampered the rescue effort. Pittman hinted that conditions would not improve until at least next week. According to Pittman, the amount and thickness of the pack ice is worse for seal hunters than it has been in the last 15 years.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: "Roberts nægtede blankt at sige noget om, hvornår han mener, at livet begynder, hvilket er et vigtigt spørgsmål, når man overvejer etikken ved abort. Han sagde, at det ville være uetisk at kommentere på detaljerne i lignende sager. Han gentog dog sin tidligere erklæring om, at Roe v. Wade var ""landets etablerede lov"" og understregede vigtigheden af, at højesteretten træffer konsekvente afgørelser. Han bekræftede også at han troede på den underforståede ret til privatliv, som Roe-beslutningen hvilede på."
mt: "Roberts refused to say when he thinks life begins, which is an important question when considering the ethics of abortion. He said it would be unethical to comment on the details of similar cases. He repeated his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was ""the established law of the land"" and emphasized the importance of the Supreme Court making consistent decisions. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy, on which Roe's decision was based."
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: Præcis klokken 8:46 faldt der en stilhed over byen som markerede det nøjagtige øjeblik, hvor det første fly ramte sit mål. To stråler af lys er blevet installeret, således at de peger op mod himlen i løbet af natten. Bygningen af fem nye skyskrabere er i gang på stedet med et transportcenter og en mindepark i midten.
mt: 8:46 a.m. was the precise moment when the city fell silent, marking the exact time the first plane hit its target. Two beams of light have been installed, so that they point up to the sky at night. Five new skyscrapers are being built on the site, with a transportation center and a memorial park in the middle.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: "Alle huleindgangene, som blev navngivet ""De syv søstre"", er mellem 100 og 250 meter (328 og 820 fod) i diameter. Infrarøde billeder viser, at temperatursvingningerne fra nat og dag viser, at de sandsynligvis er grotter. Om dagen er de køligere end den omgivende overflade, og om natten er de varmere. ""Glen Cushing fra United States Geological Surveys (USGS) Astrogeology Team og Northern Arizona University, Flagstaff, Arizona sagde: ""Deres termiske opførsel indikerer, at de er ret dybe huller i jorden, selvom de ikke opfører sig så stabilt som store huller på Jorden, der ofte holder en ret konstant temperatur døgnet igennem."""
mt: "All the named ""Seven Sisters"" are between 100 and 250 meters (328 and 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that temperature fluctuations from night and day indicate that they are probably caves. By day they are cooler than the surrounding surface, and at night they are warmer. ""Glen Cushing from the United States Geological Surveys (USGS) Astrogeology Team and Northern Arizona University, Flagstaff, Arizona said: ""Their thermal behavior indicates that they are quite deep holes in the ground, even though they don't behave as stably as large holes on Earth, which often hold a fairly constant temperature throughout the day."""
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: Manden kørte angiveligt et trehjulet køretøj udstyret med sprængstof, ind i en menneskemængde. Manden som er mistænkt for at detonere bomben blev tilbageholdt, efter at han pådrog sig skader i forbindelse med eksplosionen. Myndighederne kender stadig ikke hans navn, selvom de ved at han er medlem af den uighuriske etniske gruppe.
mt: A man drove a three-wheeled vehicle fitted with explosives into a crowd. The suspect was detained after he was injured in the explosion. Authorities still do not know his name, although they know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: Sydafrika har besejret All Blacks (New Zealand) i en kamp i rugby-unionens Tri Nations-turnering på Royal Bafokeng Stadium i Rustenburg, Sydafrika. Den endelige score var en et-points sejr, 21 til 20, der endte All Blacks' sejrstribe på 15 kampe. For Springboks var det et comeback efter fem tabte kampe i træk. Det var den sidste kamp for All Blacks, som allerede havde vundet trofæet for to uger siden. Den sidste kamp i serien vil finde sted på Ellis Park i Johannesburg i næste uge, når Springboks møder det australske hold.
mt: South Africa has defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a match in rugby union's Tri Nations tournament at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' winning streak at 15 games. For the Springboks it was a comeback after five consecutive losses. It was the last match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The last match in the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks meet the Australian team.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: Stationen fastholdt sin højde indtil afslutningen af rumvandringen, selvom et gyroskop gik tabt tidligere i rumstationens mission. Chiao og Sharipov rapporterede, at de var på sikker afstand til de styreraketter der kontrollerede højden. Russisk jordkontrol aktiverede jetpropellerne, og stationen genvandt sin normale højde.
mt: The station maintained its altitude until the end of the spacewalk, even though a gyroscope was lost earlier in the station's mission. Chiao and Sharipov reported that they were at a safe distance from the thrusters that controlled the altitude. Russian ground control activated the jet engines, and the station regained its normal altitude.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: Sagen blev retsforfulgt i Virginia, da det er hjemsted for den førende internetudbyder AOL, virksomheden der stiftede anklagerne. Dette er første gang, der er blevet givet en dom ved hjælp af den lovgivning, der blev vedtaget i 2003 for at bremse masse-e-mails, også kaldet spam, fra uopfordret distribution til brugeres postkasser.
mt: The case was prosecuted in Virginia, as it is the home of leading Internet provider AOL, the company that filed the charges. This is the first time a verdict has been given using legislation passed in 2003 to curb mass e-mails, also known as spam, from unsolicited distribution to users' inboxes.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: Den 28-årige Vidal har sluttet sig til Barca for tre sæsoner siden fra Sevilla. Vidal har, siden han flyttede til den catalanske hovedstad, spillet 49 kampe for klubben.
mt: 28-year-old Vidal has joined Barca for three seasons from Sevilla. Vidal has played 49 games for the club since moving to the Catalan capital.

src: Ingen tsunamiadvarsel er udsendt og ifølge Jakartas geofysiske agentur kommer der heller ikke nogen, fordi jordskælvet ikke når størrelseskravet på 6,5. På trods af at der ikke var nogen tsunamivarsel, begyndte beboerne at gå i panik, og de begyndte at forlade deres virksomheder og hjem.
mt: No tsunami warning was issued and according to Jakarta's geophysical agency, there won't be one, because the earthquake did not meet the size requirement of 6.5. Despite there being no tsunami warning, residents began to panic, and began to leave their businesses and homes.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: De fandt ud af, at solen fungerer på de samme grundlæggende principper som andre stjerner: Aktiviteten af alle stjernerne i systemet viste sig at være drevet af deres lysstyrke, deres rotation og intet andet. Lysstyrken og rotationen bruges sammen til at bestemme en stjernes Rossby number, som er relateret til plasmastrømmen. Jo mindre Rossby-tallet er, desto mindre aktiv er stjernen med hensyn til magnetiske vendinger.
mt: They found that the sun works on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. Luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to the plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number is, the less active the star is in terms of magnetic reversals.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Ud af 1.400 personer adspurgt forud for det føderale valg i 2010, voksede antallet af dem, som er imod at Australien bliver en republik, med 8 procent siden 2008. Konstitueret premierminister Julia Gillard sagde under kampagnen til det føderale valg i 2010, at hun mente, at Australien bør blive en republik i slutningen af dronning Elizabeth 2.s regeringstid. 34 procent af dem i undersøgelsen deler dette synspunkt, og ønsker at Dronning Elizabeth II skal være Australiens sidste monark. I afstemningens forskellige ekstremer mener 29 procent af de adspurgte, at Australien bør blive en republik hurtigst muligt, mens 31 procent mener, at Australien aldrig bør blive en republik.
mt: 1,400 people surveyed before the federal election in 2010, the number of those who are against Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 percent since 2008. Constituted Prime Minister Julia Gillard said during the campaign for the federal election in 2010, that she thought Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 percent of those surveyed share this view, and want Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. In the different extremes of the poll, 29 percent of those surveyed believe that Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 percent believe that Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: Leslie Aun, en talsmand for Komen Foundation, fortalte, at organisationen adopterede en ny regel, der ikke tillader, at tilskud eller midler bliver tildelt organisationer, som er under juridisk efterforskning. Komens holdning diskvalificerede organisationen Planned Parenthood,  da en undersøgelse af, hvordan organisationen bruger og rapporterer den økonomiske støtte var under udarbejdelse af medlem af Repræsentanternes Hus Cliff Stearns. Via sin rolle som formand for Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, som er under ledelse af House Energy and Commerce Committe undersøger Stearns hvorvidt skatter anvendes til at finansiere aborter gennem Planned Parenthood,
mt: Leslie Aun, a spokeswoman for Komen Foundation, told that the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funds to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's stance disqualified the organization Planned Parenthood,  as an investigation of how the organization uses and reports the financial support was under preparation by a member of the House of Representatives Cliff Stearns. Via his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the leadership of the House Energy and Commerce Committee, Stearns investigates whether taxes are used to finance abortions through Planned Parenthood,
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

src: "Politiet i Madhya Pradesh fandt den stjålne bærbare computer og mobiltelefon. Vicegeneralinspektør D K Arya sagde: ""Vi har arresteret fem personer der voldtog den schweiziske kvinde, og vi har fundet hendes mobiltelefon og bærbare computer"". De anklagedes navne er Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar og Vishnu Kanjar. Politikommissær Chandra Shekhar Solanki fortalte, at de anklagede mødte i retten med deres ansigter tildækket."
mt: "Police in Madhya Pradesh found the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Vice General Inspector D K Arya said: "We have arrested five people who assaulted the Swiss woman, and we have found her mobile phone and laptop." The accused names are Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police Commissioner Chandra Shekhar Solanki told that the accused appeared in court with their faces covered."
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: ASUS Eee PC, tidligere lanceret på verdensplan af omkostningsbesparende og funktionalitetsmæssige grunde, blev et stort emne i Taipei IT-måned 2007. Men forbrugermarkedet for bærbare computere vil variere og ændre sig radikalt, efter at ASUS i 2007 blev overrakt Taiwans bæredygtighedspris af direktør Yuan fra den kinesiske republik.
mt: The ASUS Eee PC, previously launched worldwide for cost-saving and functional reasons, was a big topic in Taipei IT month 2007. But the consumer market for portable computers will vary and change radically, after ASUS was awarded Taiwan's sustainability prize by director Yuan of the Republic of China in 2007.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: Problemet begyndte den 1. januar, da snesevis af lokale beboere klagede til Obanazawa Posthus om, at de ikke havde modtaget deres traditionelle og regelmæssige nytårskort. I går udgav postvæsenet deres undskyldning til borgerne og medierne, efter det blev opdaget at drengen havde skjult mere end 600 postdokumenter, herunder 429 nytårspostkort, som ikke blev leveret til de tilsigtede modtagere.
mt: The problem began on January 1, when hundreds of local residents complained to Obanazawa Post Office that they had not received their traditional and regular New Year's cards. Yesterday, the postal service issued their apology to the citizens and the media, after it was discovered that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year's postcards, which were not delivered to the intended recipients.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Murray tabte det første sæt i en tiebreak, efter at begge mænd havde vundet alle egne serv i sættet. Del Potro førte tidligt i andet sæt, men også dette endte uafgjort med 6-6. På dette tidspunkt blev Potro behandlet for sine skulderproblemer, men var i stand til at vende tilbage til kampen.
mt: Murray lost the first set in a tiebreak, after both men had won all their own serves in sets. Del Potro led early in the second set, but also this ended tied at 6-6. At this point Potro was treated for his shoulder problems, but was able to return to the match.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.
