src: Den mest almindelige årsag til ulykker om vinteren er glatte veje, vejbelægning (fortove) og især trappetrin. Du får som minimum brug for fodtøj med passende såler. Sommersko er ofte meget glatte på is og sne, og nogle vinterstøvler er endda utilstrækkelige. Mønsteret bør være dybt nok - 5 mm (1/5 tommer) eller mere - og materialet skal forblive blødt i kolde temperaturer. Nogle støvler har knopper, og der findes ekstra knopper til glatte forhold, der kan sættes på de fleste sko og støvler på enten hælene eller både hælene og sålen. Hælene bør være lave og brede. Sand, grus eller salt (kalciumklorid) spredes ofte på veje eller stier, så man bedre kan stå fast.
mt: The most common cause of accidents in the winter is slippery roads, pavement (sidewalks) and especially stairs. You will at least need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are often very slippery on ice and snow, and some winter boots are even insufficient. The pattern should be deep enough - 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more - and the material should remain soft in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs, and there are extra studs for slippery conditions that can be put on most shoes and boots on either the heels or both the heels and the sole. The heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often spread on roads or paths, so you can stand better.
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: "Cook-øerne er en østat i fri tilknytning til New Zealand, Øerne er beliggende i Polynesien, midt i det sydlige Stillehav. Det er et øhav med 15 øer fordelt over 2,2 millioner km2 hav. Da de er i samme tidszone som Hawaii, bliver øerne sommetider tænkt på som ""Hawaii nedenfor"". Selvom de er mindre, minder de nogle ældre besøgende om Hawaii før det blev en stat, uden alle de store turisthoteller og anden udvikling. Cook-øerne har ikke nogen byer, men er sammensat af 15 forskellige øer. Hovedøerne er Rarotonga og Aitutaki."
mt: "Cook Islands is an island country in free association with New Zealand, The Islands are located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an oceanic country with 15 islands spread over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. Because they are in the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as "Hawaii below". Although they are smaller, some older visitors are reminded of Hawaii before it became a state, without all the large tourist hotels and other development. Cook Islands has no cities, but is composed of 15 different islands. The main islands are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: Tilladelser skal reserveres på forhånd. Du skal have en tilladelse for at kunne overnatte i Sirena. Sirena er den eneste ranger station, som tilbyder indkvartering i sovesale samt varme måltider foruden camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo og Los Patos tilbyder kun camping og ingen mad. Det er muligt at købe parktilladelser på rangerstationen i Puerto Jiménez, men de modtager ikke kreditkort. Parktjenesten (MINAE) udsteder ikke parktilladelser mere end en måned før forventet ankomst. CafeNet El Sol tilbyder en reservationstjeneste på 30$ eller 10$ for et endagspas; flere detaljer kan ses på deres Corcovado-side.
mt: Reservations must be made in advance. You must have a permit to be able to overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory accommodation and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo and Los Patos only offer camping and no food. It is possible to buy park permits at the ranger station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards. The park service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than a month before expected arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for 30$ or 10$ for a day pass; more details can be seen on their Corcovado-side.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Backpacking på ski: Denne aktivitet kaldes også for backcountry skiløb, skiture eller skivandring. Det er relateret til, men involverer normalt ikke skiture i alpin stil eller mountaineering. Sidstnævnte udføres i stejlt terræn og kræver meget stivere ski og støvler. Du skal se skiruten som var den en lignende vandrerute. Under gode forhold vil du kunne dække noget større afstande, end hvis du går – men det er kun meget sjældent, at du får samme hastighed som på langrend uden en tung rygsæk og på klargjorte spor.
mt: Backpacking on skis: This activity is also called backcountry skiing, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to, but usually does not involve alpine skiing or mountaineering. The latter is done in steep terrain and requires stiffer skis and boots. You should see the ski route as a similar hiking route. Under good conditions you will be able to cover greater distances than if you walk – but it is only very rarely that you will get the same speed as on cross-country skiing without a heavy backpack and on groomed tracks.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: Hjemkomst-chok kommer hurtigere end kulturchok (der er ikke i samme grad en periode med begejstring over det nye), varer længere og kan være mere alvorlig. Rejsende, der havde nemt ved at tilpasse sig den nye kultur, har det nogle gange meget svært ved at tilpasse sig deres egen kultur. Når du kommer hjem igen, efter at have boet i udlandet, har du tilpasset dig den nye kultur og mistet nogle af dine vaner fra din hjemkultur. Da du rejste til udlandet for første gang, var folk sikkert tålmodige og forstående, da de vidste at en rejsende i et helt nyt land har brug for at tilpasse sig. Folk forventer ikke nødvendigvis, at det er nødvendigt at udvise tålmodighed og forståelse, når man som rejsende vender hjem.
mt: Homecoming shock comes faster than culture shock (there is not to the same extent a period of enthusiasm for the new), lasts longer and can be more serious. Travelers who easily adapted to the new culture often have it very hard to adapt to their own culture. When you come home again, after having lived abroad, you have adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you traveled abroad for the first time, people were probably patient and understanding, as they knew that a traveler in a completely new country needs to adapt. People do not necessarily expect that it is necessary to show patience and understanding, when you as a traveler returns home.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: Elge (også kendt som elsdyr) er ikke som sådan aggressive, men de forsvarer sig, hvis de oplever en trussel. Når folk ikke ser elge som potentielt farlige, kan de risikere at komme for tæt på og sætte sig selv i fare.
mt: Elk (also known as wapiti) are not inherently aggressive, but they will defend themselves if they feel threatened. When people do not see elk as potentially dangerous, they can risk getting too close and putting themselves in danger.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: Elge (også kendt som elsdyr) er ikke som sådan aggressive, men de forsvarer sig, hvis de oplever en trussel. Når folk ikke ser elge som potentielt farlige, kan de risikere at komme for tæt på og sætte sig selv i fare.
mt: Elk (also known as wapiti) are not inherently aggressive, but they will defend themselves if they feel threatened. When people do not see elk as potentially dangerous, they can risk getting too close and putting themselves in danger.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: I den varmeste tid på dagen kan rejsende opleve fatamorgana, der danner en illusion af vand (eller andre ting). Disse kan være farlige, hvis den rejsende forfølger illusionen og spilder dyrebar energi og sit resterende vand. Selv de varmeste ørkener kan blive ekstremt kolde om natten. Der er en reel risiko for hypotermi uden varmt tøj.
mt: In the hottest part of the day, travelers may experience mirages, which create an illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursues the illusion and wastes valuable energy and their remaining water. Even the hottest deserts can become extremely cold at night. There is a real risk of hypothermia without warm clothing.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: Den Dominikanske Republik (spansk: República Dominicana) er et land i Caribien placeret på den østlige halvdel af øen Hispaniola, som den deler med Haiti. Udover hvide sandstrande og bjerglandskaber er landet hjemsted for den ældste europæiske by i Amerika, som nu er en del af Santo Domingo. Øen blev først beboet af Taínos- og Caribes-folkene. Cariberne var et Arawakan-talende folk, der var ankommet omkring 10.000 f.Kr. Inden for få år efter ankomsten af de europæiske opdagelsesrejsende, var befolkningen i Tainos blevet reduceret betydeligt af de spanske erobrere Baseret på Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) dræbte de spanske erobrere omkring 100.000 taínoer mellem 1492 og 1498.
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a country in the Caribbean located on the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti. In addition to white sand beaches and mountainous landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, which is now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by Taíno and Carib people. The Caribs were an Arawakan-speaking people who arrived around 10,000 BC. Within a few years of the arrival of the European explorers, the population of the Taíno had been significantly reduced by the Spanish conquerors based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taíno between 1492 and 1498.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: "Alpin vintersport, som omfatter skiløb og snowboarding, er populære sportsaktiviteter, der involverer at køre ned af sneklædte terræner med ski eller et snowboard fastspændt på dine fødder. Skiløb er en stor rejseaktivitet med mange entusiaster - undertiden kendt som ""skibumser"", der planlægger hele ferien omkring det at stå på ski i et bestemt område. Folk har stået på ski i tusindvis af år - hulemalerier helt tilbage fra år 5.000 f.Kr viser folk, der står på ski! Alpin skiløb som sport stammer helt tilbage til det 17. århundrede, og i 1861 blev den første rekreative skiklub åbnet af nordmænd i Australien."
mt: "Alpine winter sports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular recreational activities that involve sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travel activity with many enthusiasts - sometimes known as "ski bums," who plan the entire vacation around the idea of skiing in a particular area. People have been skiing for thousands of years - cave paintings as far back as 5000 BC show people skiing! Alpine skiing as a sport dates back to the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: De østafrikanske øer ligger i Det Indiske Ocean ud for Afrikas østkyst. Madagaskar er klart den største og er et kontinent for sig selv, når det kommer til vilde dyr. De fleste af de mindre øer er uafhængige nationer eller er forbundet med Frankrig og kendt for deres luksuriøse strandresorter. Araberne bragte også Islam til landet, og religionen blev hurtigt udbredt  på Comorerne og Mayotte. Den europæiske indflydelse og kolonialisme startede i det 15. århundrede med den portugisiske opdagelsesrejsende Vasco da Gamas opdagelse af Kap-ruten mellem Europa og Indien.
mt: The East African islands lie in the Indian Ocean off the east coast of Africa. Madagascar is clearly the largest and is a continent of its own when it comes to wild animals. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations or are associated with France and known for their luxurious beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the land, and the religion quickly spread on the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century with the Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama's discovery of the Cape route between Europe and India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Der er tradition for at holde sig vågen på påskenatten for at se solopgangen på et udsat sted. Der er selvfølgelig kristne teologiske forklaringer på denne tradition, men det kan meget vel være et forårs- og frugtbarhedsritual fra før kristendommen. De mere traditionelle kirker holder ofte påskevigilie lørdag aften i påskeweekenden, hvor menighederne ofte bryder ud i fest ved midnat for at fejre Kristi genopstandelse.
mt: There is a tradition to stay up on Easter night to see the sunrise at a remote place. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it can very well be a spring and fertility ritual from before Christianity. The more traditional churches often hold Easter vigil on Saturday night in the Easter weekend, where congregations often break out in celebration at midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: Ecuador kræver, at cubanske borgere modtager et invitationsbrev før indrejse til Ecuador via internationale lufthavne eller grænsepassager. Dette brev skal legaliseres af Ecuadors udenrigsministerium og opfylde visse krav. Disse krav har til formål at sikre en organiseret indvandringsstrøm mellem de to lande. Cubanske statsborgere, som har et amerikansk green card, bør tage til et ecuadoriansk konsulat for at skaffe en undtagelse fra kravet. Dit pas skal være gyldigt i mindst 6 måneder efter datoen for din rejse. Du skal have en returbillet eller en billet til en videre rejse for at bevise længden af dit ophold.
mt: Ecuador requires Cuban citizens to receive an invitation letter before entry to Ecuador through international airports or border crossings. This letter must be legalized by Ecuador's Ministry of Foreign Affairs and meet certain requirements. These requirements are intended to ensure an organized immigration stream between the two countries. Cuban citizens who have a US green card should go to an Ecuadorian consulate to obtain an exemption from the requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months after the date of your trip. You must have a return ticket or a ticket to a further journey to prove the length of your stay.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: Briller kan være billigere i udlandet, særligt i lav-indkomstlande hvor arbejdslønnen er lavere. Overvej at få lavet en undersøgelse af øjnene i eget hjem, især hvis forsikringen dækker det, og tag recepten med, så den kan arkiveres andetsteds. De eksklusive stel fra anerkendte mærker som findes i sådanne områder kan have to problemer; nogle kan være billige kopier, og de ægte, importerede varer kan være dyrere end derhjemme.
mt: Eyeglasses can be cheaper abroad, especially in low-income countries where the unemployment rate is lower. Consider having an eye exam done at home, especially if the insurance covers it, and take the prescription with you so it can be archived elsewhere. The exclusive frames from recognized brands that are found in such areas can have two problems; some can be cheap copies, and the genuine, imported items can be more expensive than at home.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: Den officielle valuta på Falklandsøerne er Falklandspundet (FKP), hvis værdi er fastsat svarende til værdien af et britisk pund (GBP). Penge kan veksles i den eneste bank på øerne, der ligger i Stanley overfor FIC West-butikken. Der bliver overordnet set taget imod britiske pund alle steder på øerne, og inden for Stanley accepteres kreditkort og amerikanske dollars også ofte. På de yderliggende øer vil kreditkort sandsynligvis ikke kunne anvendes, selvom britisk og amerikansk valuta måske vil kunne bruges; spørg ejerne i forvejen for at få at vide, hvilken betalingsmetode accepteres. Det er næsten umuligt at veksle Falklands valuta uden for øerne, så sørg for at veksle dine penge, før du forlader øerne.
mt: The official currency of the Falkland Islands is the Falkland pound (FKP), whose value is pegged to the British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank on the islands, which is located in Stanley opposite the FIC West shop. British pounds are generally accepted everywhere on the islands, and credit cards and American dollars are also often accepted in Stanley. Credit cards will likely not be accepted on the outlying islands, although British and American currency may be accepted; ask the owners beforehand to find out which payment method is accepted. It is almost impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside the islands, so make sure to exchange your money before leaving the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: De fleste af templerne har en festival én gang i året, som foregår fra slutningen af ​​november til midten af ​​maj. Festivalen varierer alt efter templets årskalender. Tempelfestivalerne fejres som oftest, når templet har jubilæum, når den præsiderende gud har fødselsdag eller i tilfælde af andre større begivenheder forbundet med templet. Det er meget interessant at se Keralas tempelfestivaler med deres jævnlige optog med pyntede elefanter, tempelorkestre og andre festligheder.
mt: Most of the temples have a festival once a year, which takes place from the end of November to mid-May. The festival varies according to the temple's annual calendar. Temple festivals are usually celebrated when the temple has a jubilee, when the presiding god has a birthday or in the case of other major events related to the temple. It is very interesting to see Kerala's temple festivals with their regular parades of decorated elephants, temple orchestras and other festivities.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: Den indlysende måde at flyve på første eller forretningsklasse på, er at lægge en stor bunke penge frem for at få muligheden (eller endnu bedre, få din virksomhed til at gøre det for dig). Dette er dog ikke billigt: som grov tommelfingerregel kan du forvente at betale op til fire gange økonomiklassens normalpris for business-class og elleve gange prisen for første klasse! Generelt set er der ingen grund til overhovedet at lede efter rabatter på sæder på business- eller første klasse på direkte fly fra A til B. Flyselskaber ved godt, at bestemte kernegrupper af passagerer er villige til at betale mange penge for det privilegium at komme hurtigt og behageligt frem, og de sætter deres priser derefter.
mt: The obvious way to fly on first or business class is to put a big pile of money in front of you to get the opportunity (or better yet, get your company to do it for you). This is not cheap: as a rough rule of thumb you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy class price for business class and eleven times the price for first class! Generally speaking there is no reason to look for discounts on seats on business or first class on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know that certain core groups of passengers are willing to pay a lot of money for the privilege of getting there quickly and comfortably, and they set their prices accordingly.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Den indlysende måde at flyve på første eller forretningsklasse på, er at lægge en stor bunke penge frem for at få muligheden (eller endnu bedre, få din virksomhed til at gøre det for dig). Dette er dog ikke billigt: som grov tommelfingerregel kan du forvente at betale op til fire gange økonomiklassens normalpris for business-class og elleve gange prisen for første klasse! Generelt set er der ingen grund til overhovedet at lede efter rabatter på sæder på business- eller første klasse på direkte fly fra A til B. Flyselskaber ved godt, at bestemte kernegrupper af passagerer er villige til at betale mange penge for det privilegium at komme hurtigt og behageligt frem, og de sætter deres priser derefter.
mt: The obvious way to fly on first or business class is to put a big pile of money in front of you to get the opportunity (or better yet, get your company to do it for you). This is not cheap: as a rough rule of thumb you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy class price for business class and eleven times the price for first class! Generally speaking there is no reason to look for discounts on seats on business or first class on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know that certain core groups of passengers are willing to pay a lot of money for the privilege of getting there quickly and comfortably, and they set their prices accordingly.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Flyselskaber såsom Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines har i stort omfang udvidet deres ydelser til Afrika, og de tilbyder forbindelser til mange større afrikanske byer til mere konkurrencedygtige priser end andre europæiske flyselskaber. Fra 2014 flyver Turkish Airlines til 39 destinationer i 30 afrikanske lande. Hvis du har længere tid til rådighed, kan du se, hvordan din samlede billetpris til Afrika er i forhold til en billet til jordomrejse. Du må ikke glemme at tilføje de ekstra udgifter der er ved yderligere visaer, afgangsafgifter, landtransport osv. for alle områderne uden for Afrika.
mt: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have expanded their services to Africa to a large extent, and they offer connections to many major African cities at more competitive prices than other European airlines. From 2014 Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries. If you have more time, you can see how your total ticket price to Africa compares to a ticket to circumnavigate the globe. You must not forget to add the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, land transport etc. for all areas outside of Africa.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: Den billigste måde at få mad på, er normalt at købe mad i supermarkedet. Uden mulighed for at tilberede mad, er valget dog begrænset til færdigretter. Supermarkeder får i stigende grad et mere varieret udvalg af færdiglavet mad. Nogle tilbyder endda en mikrobølgeovn eller lignende, hvor maden kan varmes. I nogle lande eller butikstyper er der mindst én restaurant på stedet, som ofte er ret uformel og har overkommelige priser.
mt: The cheapest way to get food is usually to buy food in the supermarket. Without the ability to cook food, the choice is limited to ready meals. Supermarkets are increasingly offering a more varied selection of ready-to-eat food. Some even offer a microwave oven or similar, where the food can be heated. In some countries or store types, there is at least one restaurant on the site, which is often quite informal and has reasonable prices.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: Den måde fransk tales på i Belgien og Schweiz, er en smule anderledes end i Frankrig, men de er ens nok til at være gensidigt forståelige. Især talsystemet i det fransktalende Belgien og Schweiz har nogle små ejendommeligheder, som er forskellige fra det fransk, der tales i Frankrig, og udtalen af nogle ord er en smule anderledes. Ikke desto mindre ville alle fransktalende belgere og schweizere have lært standardfransk i skolen, så de ville kunne forstå dig, selv hvis du brugte det almindelige, franske talsystem.
mt: The way French is spoken in Belgium and Switzerland is a little different from the way it is spoken in France, but they are close enough to be mutually intelligible.  Especially the French spoken in the French-speaking part of Belgium and Switzerland has some small peculiarities, which are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is a little different.  Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you, even if you used the common, French pronunciation system.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src: Kun få flyselskaber tilbyder stadig pårørendepriser, som giver små rabatter på sidste-øjebliksrejser i forbindelse med dødsfald. Flyselskaber som tilbyder disse omfatter Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flyafgange fra USA eller Canada, samt WestJet. Under alle omstændigheder er du nødt til at booke telefonisk direkte hos flyselskabet.
mt: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which offer small discounts on last-minute flights in connection with deaths. Airlines offering these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights from the United States or Canada, and WestJet. However, you must book directly with the airline by phone.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: GPS-navigationsapps på din smartphone kan være den nemmeste og mest bekvemmelige måde at finde rundt på, når du ikke befinder dig i dit hjemland. Det kan spare penge i forhold til at købe nye kort til en GPS, en separat GPS-enhed eller leje af en fra et biludlejningsfirma. Hvis du ikke har dataforbindelse på din telefon, eller når den er uden for rækkevidde, kan dens funktionalitet være begrænset eller utilgængelig.
mt: GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to get around when you're not in your home country. It can save money compared to buying new maps for a GPS, a separate GPS unit, or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have data connectivity on your phone, or when it's out of range, its functionality may be limited or unavailable.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

src: Det er bedst at se Galapagosøernes steder og dyreliv med båd, ligesom Charles Darwin gjorde det i 1835. Over 60 krydstogtsskibe sejler gennem Galapagos-farvandene - med størrelser fra 8 til 100 passagerer. De fleste reserverer deres pladser i god tid (da bådene som regel er fyldt godt op i højsæsonen). Sørg for at den agent som du booker igennem er specialist i Galapagos og har godt kendskab til mange forskellige typer skibe. Dette vil sikre, at dine særlige interesser og/eller begrænsninger bliver matchet med det skib, der passer bedst til dem.
mt: It is best to see the Galapagos Islands' places and wildlife by boat, as Charles Darwin did in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships sail through the Galapagos waters - with sizes from 8 to 100 passengers. Most book their places in advance (as the boats are usually well filled in high season). Make sure that the agent you book through is a specialist in Galapagos and has good knowledge of many different types of ships. This will ensure that your special interests and/or limitations are matched with the ship that best suits them.
ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

src: Kasinoer gør alt, hvad de kan, for at gæsterne bruger så meget tid og så mange penge som muligt. Vinduer og ure er som regel ikke til stede, og det kan være svært at finde en udgang. De plejer at have særlige tilbud på mad, drikke og underholdning for at holde gæsterne i godt humør og beholde dem i huset. Nogle steder tilbydes alkoholiske drikke på husets regning. Men fuldskab svækker dømmekraften, og alle ægte gamblere ved, hvor vigtigt det er at være ædru.
mt: Casinos do everything they can to keep their guests as long and spend as much money as possible. Windows and clocks are usually not present, and it can be difficult to find an exit. They usually have special offers on food, drink and entertainment to keep guests in good spirits and keep them in the house. Some places offer alcoholic drinks on the house's account. But intoxication weakens judgment, and all real gamblers know how important it is to be sober.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: Alle navneord, inklusive ordet Sie for dig, begynder altid med stort, også i midten af en sætning. Dette er en vigtig måde at skelne mellem nogle verber og objektiver Det gør uden tvivl også læsning nemmere, selvom skrivning kompliceres noget af behovet for at finde ud af, hvorvidt et udsagnsord eller tillægsord er benyttet i en substantiveret form.
mt: All nouns, including the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and adjectives. It certainly does make reading easier, although writing is complicated a little by the need to determine whether a noun or adjective is used in a substantivized form.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: "I store dele af verden er det at vinke en venlig gestus, der betyder ""hej."" Men i Malaysia, i det mindste blandt den malaysiske befolkning i landdistrikterne, betyder det ""kom herhen"", ligesom pegefingeren bøjet mod kroppen, som er en gestus, der bliver brugt i visse vestlige lande, og gestussen bør kun bruges til det formål. På samme måde vil en britisk turist i Spanien måske misforstå et afskedsvink med håndfladen rettet mod personen, som vinker, (i stedet for den person som vinkes til) som et tegn på, at de skal komme tilbage."
mt: "In much of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, meaning "hello." But in Malaysia, at least among the rural Malay population, it means "come here," just as the bent index finger, which is a gesture used in certain Western countries, and the gesture should only be used for that purpose. Similarly, a British tourist in Spain might misunderstand a farewell wave with the palm facing the person waving, (instead of the person being waved to) as a sign that they should come back."
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: Gletscherne er ikke stabile, men flyder ned ad bjerget. Dette forårsager revner og sprækker, som kan være vel skjult af snebroer. Væggene og tagene i isgrotten kan kollapse, og revner kan lukke til. Ved gletscherkanter river store blokke sig løs, falder ned og springer eller ruller måske længere væk fra kanten.
mt: Glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This causes cracks and crevasses, which can be well hidden by snow bridges. The walls and ceilings of the ice cave can collapse, and cracks can close. At glacier edges, large blocks break off, fall down and bounce or roll away from the edge.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: Goma er en turistby i Den Demokratiske Republik Congo og ligger helt østpå nær Rwanda. I 2002 blev Goma ødelagt af lava fra Nyiragongo-vulkanen, som begravede de fleste af byens gader i særdeleshed i byens centrum. På trods af at Goma er rimelig sikkert, bør alle besøg uden for Goma undersøges, for at forstå de kampe, der finder sted i Nordkivu-provinsen. Byen er også base for bestigning af Nyiragongo-vulkanen samt et af de billigste steder at spore bjerggorillaer i Afrika. Du kan bruge en boda-boda (motorcykel-taxa) til at komme rundt i Goma. Den normale (lokale) pris er ~500 congolesiske franc for den korte tur.
mt: Goma is a tourist town in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and lies east of the country near Rwanda. In 2002, Goma was destroyed by lava from Nyiragongo volcano, which buried most of the town's streets, especially in the city center. Despite Goma being relatively safe, all visits outside of Goma should be assessed to understand the fighting that is taking place in North Kivu province. The city is also a base for climbing Nyiragongo volcano as well as one of the cheapest places to track mountain gorillas in Africa. You can use a boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around in Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese francs for the short trip.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: For at slå lejr i selve Grand Canyon kræves en vildmarkstilladelse. Tilladelser er begrænsede til at beskytte kløften og er tilgængelige fra den første dag i måneden, fire måneder før startmåneden. Derfor bliver en backcountry-tilladelse for en hvilken som helst startdato i maj tilgængelig den 1. januar. Pladser til de mest populære områder såsom Bright Angel Campground i nærheden af Phantom Ranch, fyldes generelt op via forespørgslerne der modtages på den første dato, de er åbne for reservationer. Der er et begrænset antal tilladelser forbeholdt drop-in anmodninger, som er tilgængelige efter først-til-mølle-princippet.
mt: To camp in the actual Grand Canyon, a backcountry permit is required. Permits are limited to protect the canyon and are available from the first day of the month, four months before the start month. Therefore, a backcountry permit for any start date in May will be available on January 1. Reservations for the most popular areas such as Bright Angel Campground near Phantom Ranch fill up generally through the applications received on the first day they are open for reservations. There is a limited number of permits held for drop-in requests, which are available on a first-come, first-served basis.
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: Nogle hoteller har en arv fra dampjernbanernes og oceanskibenes guldalder: før Anden Verdenskrig, i det 19. eller starten af det 20. århundrede. Disse hoteller var der, hvor de rige og berømte fra den tid boede, og havde ofte fine spisesteder og natteliv. De gammeldags beslag, manglen på de nyeste faciliteter og en vis yndefuld ældning er også en del af deres karakter. Selvom de som regel er privatejede, indkvarterer de sommetider besøgende statsledere og andre højtstående embedsmænd. En rejsende med masser af penge vil måske overveje at flyve verden rundt og opdele turen med ophold på mange af disse hoteller.
mt: Some hotels have a legacy from the steam railway and ocean liner golden age: before World War II, in the 19th or early 20th century. These hotels were where the rich and famous of the time stayed, and often had fine dining and nightlife. Their old-fashioned fittings, lack of modern facilities, and a certain dignified aging are also part of their character. Although they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other high-ranking officials. A traveler with plenty of money might consider flying around the world and dividing the trip with stays at many of these hotels.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: "Takket være undersøiske fiberoptiske kabelforbindelser til Europa samt satellitbaseret bredbånd er Grønland godt forbundet, og 93% af befolkningen har internetadgang. Dit hotel eller dine værter (hvis du bor i et gæstehus eller privat hjem) vil sandsynligvis have wi-fi eller en computer med internetforbindelse, og alle byer har en internetcafé eller et sted med offentligt wi-fi. Som nævnt herover anses ordet ""Eskimo"", selvom det stadig anses for acceptabelt i USA, for at være nedsættende for mange arktiske folk uden for USA - specielt i Canada. Mens du måske hører det ord blive brugt af grønlandske indfødte, bør det ikke bruges af udlændinge. De indfødte indbyggere i Grønland kalder sig inuitter i Canada, og i Grønland kalder de sig Kalaalleq (flertal: Kalaallit), som betyder ""grønlænder"". Generelt er kriminalitet og had mod udlændinge næsten ukendt i Grønland. Selv i byerne er der ingen ""farlige områder"". Koldt vejr er måske den eneste rigtige fare, som den uforberedte vil stå over for. Hvis du besøger Grønland i de kolde måneder (og medregn, at det bliver koldere og koldere, jo længere nordpå du tager), er det essentielt at medbringe tøj, der er varmt nok. De meget lange dage om sommeren kan føre til problemer med at få nok søvn og medfølgende sundhedsproblemer. Om sommeren bør du også holde øje med de nordiske myg. De giver dig ingen sygdomme, men de kan være irriterende."
mt: "Thanks to underground fiber-optic cable connections to Europe as well as satellite-based broadband, Greenland is well connected, and 93% of the population has Internet access. Your hotel or your hosts (if you are staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have Wi-Fi or a computer with Internet access, and all towns have an Internet cafe or a place with public Wi-Fi. As mentioned above, the word "Eskimo", although still considered acceptable in the US, is considered derogatory by many Arctic peoples outside the US - especially in Canada. While you may hear it used by Greenlandic natives, it should not be used by foreigners. The indigenous inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada, and in Greenland they call themselves Kalaalleq (plural: Kalaallit), which means "Greenlander". Generally, crime and hostility towards foreigners is almost unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns there are no "dangerous areas". Cold weather is maybe the only real danger that the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland in the cold months (and remember, it will get colder and colder, the further north you go), it is essential to bring clothing that is warm enough. The very long days of summer can lead to problems with getting enough sleep and resulting health problems. In the summer, you should also keep an eye out for the Nordic mosquitoes. They do not give you any diseases, but they can be annoying."
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: Jardín de la Unión. Dette område blev bygget som et atrium til et 17. århundredes kloster, hvor Templo de San Diego er den eneste overlevende bygning. Den fungerer nu som det centrale torv, og der sker altid en masse, dag og nat. Der er flere restauranter, der omkranser haven, og om eftermiddagen og aftenen bliver der ofte givet gratis koncerter fra den centrale havepavillion. Callejon del Beso (Kyssets Gyde). To altaner, udelukkende separeret af 69 cm., er hjemsted for en historisk kærlighedslegende. Nogle børn vil fortælle dig historien for et par pennies.
mt: Jardín de la Unión. This area was built as an atrium for a 17th century convent, where Templo de San Diego is the only surviving building. It now functions as the central square, and there is always a lot going on, day and night. There are several restaurants that surround the garden, and in the afternoon and evening free concerts are often given from the central garden pavilion. Callejon del Beso (Kiss's Alley). Two balconies, separated only by 69 cm., are the home of a historical love story. Some children will tell you the story for a few pennies.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

src: Vandring er en udendørsaktivitet som består i at gå i naturlige omgivelser, ofte på vandrestier. Dagsvandreture indebærer distancer fra under et mil op til længere ruter, som kan klares på en enkelt dag. Ved en dagsvandretur på en nem rute er der ikke behov for de store forberedelser, og enhver som er i nogenlunde god form kan nyde turen. Familier med små børn kan have brug for flere forberedelser, men en dag udendørs er en god oplevelse selv med babyer og børnehavebørn.
mt: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hikes involve distances from under a mile up to longer routes, which can be completed in a single day. For a day hike on an easy trail there is no need for extensive preparation, and anyone in reasonably good condition can enjoy the hike. Families with small children may need more preparation, but a day outdoors is a good experience even with babies and preschoolers.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: "De stejle fjorde og dale, der pludselig giver vej for høje og, mere eller mindre, jævne plateauer er typiske i Norge. Disse plateauer bliver ofte omtalt som ""vidde"", hvilket betyder et bredt, åbent, træfrit sted, en grænseløs udstrækning. I Rogaland og Agder kaldes de normalt ""hei"", hvilket betyder et træløst hedelandskab, der ofte er dækket med lyng."
mt: "The steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to high and, more or less, flat plateaus are typical in Norway. These plateaus are often referred to as "vidde", which means a broad, open, treeless place, an endless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called "hei", which means a treeless heathland that is often covered with heather."
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: Turistsæsonen for bjergbyerne er generelt størst under den indiske sommer. De har dog en anden form for skønhed og charme om vinteren, hvor mange bjergbyer får masser af sne og tilbyder aktiviteter såsom skiløb og snowboarding.
mt: The tourist season for the hill stations is generally the largest during the Indian summer. They have a different kind of beauty and charm in the winter, when many hill stations get a lot of snow and offer activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: Du kan trygt stole på, at når du først er i lystbådehavnen vil alt være temmelig indlysende. Du vil møde andre båd-blaffere, som vil dele deres viden med dig. I bund og grund skal du sætte opslag op hvori du tilbyder din hjælp, gå rundt på havnen, gå op til folk der gør rent i deres lystbåde, forsøge at få kontakt med søfolk i baren osv. Prøv at tale med så mange mennesker som muligt. Efter lidt tid vil alle kende dig og give dig tips om, hvilken båd, der er på udkig efter nogen.
mt: You can safely rely on the fact that once you are in the marina, everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat enthusiasts who will share their knowledge with you. In the end, you should put up notices where you offer your help, walk around the marina, go up to people who are cleaning their boats, try to get in touch with sailors in the bar etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After some time, everyone will know you and give you tips on which boat is looking for someone.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: Hong Kong Island giver territoriet Hong Kong sit navn, og er det sted, som mange turister betragter som det primære fokusområde. Hong Kongs skyline er en gruppe bygninger, der ved deres spejling i  vandet i Victoria Harbour ofte bliver sammenlignet med et glitrende søjlediagram, For at få de bedste udsigter over Hong Kong, så forlad øen og tag til Kowloon-havnefronten på den modsatte side. Størstedelen af Hong Kongs byudvikling er tæt sammenpakket på indvundne landarealer langs den nordlige kyst. Dette er stedet, som de britiske kolonisatorer gjorde til deres eget, så hvis man leder efter beviser på områdets koloniale fortid, er dette et godt sted at starte.
mt: Hong Kong Island gives the territory Hong Kong its name, and is the place that many tourists consider the primary focal point. Hong Kong's skyline is a group of buildings, which by their reflection in the water of Victoria Harbour are often compared to a glittering sundial, To get the best views over Hong Kong, leave the island and head to the Kowloon waterfront on the opposite side. Most of Hong Kong's urban development is tightly packed on reclaimed land along the northern coast. This is where the British colonizers made their home, so if you're looking for evidence of the area's colonial past, this is a good place to start.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: Stigbøjler er støtter til rytterens fødder, som hænger ned på hver side af sadlen. De giver større stabilitet for rytteren, men kan give sikkerhedsproblemer på grund af muligheden for, at en rytters fødder sætter sig fast i dem. Hvis en rytter falder af hesten, men har en fod fanget i stigbøjlen, kan vedkommende blive trukket med, hvis hesten løber væk. For at minimere denne risiko, kan man tage nogle sikkerhedsforanstaltninger. For det første bruger mange ryttere ridestøvler med en hæl og en blød, snæver sål. Dernæst har nogle sadler, især engelske sadler, sikkerhedsbøjler, som gør at stigbøjleremmene løsnes fra sadlen, hvis de trækkes bagud af en faldende rytter.
mt: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on each side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider, but can pose safety issues due to the possibility of a rider's feet getting caught in them. If a rider falls off the horse, but has one foot caught in the stirrup, they may be dragged along if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, some safety precautions can be taken. First, many riders wear riding boots with a heel and a soft, narrow sole. Second, some saddles, especially English saddles, have safety stirrups that release the stirrup leathers from the saddle if they are pulled back by a falling rider.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: Et netværk til gæstfrihedsudveksling er en organisation, som forbinder rejsende og lokale beboere i de byer, de skal besøge. At tilmelde sig et sådant netværk kræver normalt blot at man udfylder en onlineformular; selvom nogle netværk tilbyder eller kræver yderligere bekræftelse. En liste over tilgængelige værter leveres derefter, enten på tryk og/eller online, sommetider med referencer og anmeldelser fra andre rejsende. Couchsurfing blev grundlagt i januar 2004, efter computerprogrammøren Casey Fenton fandt et billigt fly til Island men manglede et sted at overnatte. Han sendte e-mails til de studerende på det lokale universitet og modtog et overvældende antal tilbud om et gratis sted at bo.
mt: A hospitality exchange network is an organization that connects travelers and local residents in the cities they are visiting. Joining such a network usually requires only filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A list of available hosts is then provided, either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews from other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004, after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but lacked a place to stay. He sent e-mails to the students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for a free place to stay.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: Vandrerhjem henvender sig primært til unge mennesker - en typisk gæst er i tyverne - men ofte kan du også finde ældre rejsende der. Familier med børn er et sjældent syn, men nogle vandrehjem tillader dem i private værelser.
mt: Homes for the homeless are primarily for young people - a typical guest is in their twenties - but often you can also find older travelers there. Families with children are a rare sight, but some homes allow them in private rooms.
ref: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: At kunne kaste med Boomerang er en populær evne, som mange turister gerne vil lære. Hvis du vil lære at kaste med en boomerang, som kommer tilbage til dig, skal du sørge for at have en boomerang, der er velegnet til formålet. De fleste af de boomeranger, man kan få i Australien, er faktisk ikke-tilbagevendende. Det er bedst for begyndere ikke at prøve at kaste i blæsevejr.
mt: To be able to throw a boomerang is a popular skill that many tourists want to learn. If you want to learn to throw a boomerang that comes back to you, make sure you have a boomerang that is suitable for the purpose. Most of the boomerangs you can get in Australia are not returnable. It is best for beginners not to try to throw in windy weather.
ref: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: Med 17.000 øer at vælge imellem, er indonesisk mad en overordnet betegnelse, der dækker et stort udvalg af regionale madkulturer der findes i hele landet. Men hvis udtrykket bruges uden yderligere uddybning, henviser det typisk til den mad som oprindeligt stammer fra de centrale og østlige dele af hovedøen Java. Nu er det javanesiske køkken bredt tilgængeligt i hele øgruppen; det består af en række enkelt krydrede retter, hvor de mest populære krydderier er jordnødder, chili, sukker (især javansk kokossukker) og forskellige aromatiske krydderier.
mt: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian cuisine is an umbrella term covering a wide range of regional culinary cultures found throughout the archipelago. But if the term is used without further elaboration, it typically refers to the cuisine originally stemming from the central and eastern parts of the main island of Java. Now the Javanese cuisine is widely available throughout the group; it consists of a range of single-spiced dishes, where the most popular spices are peanuts, chili, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: For dem, der ikke kender medicinsk jargon, har ordene smitsom og infektiøs forskellig betydning. En smitsom sygdom er forårsaget af et patogen, såsom en virus, bakterie, svamp eller andre parasitter. En smitsom sygdom er en sygdom, der nemt bliver overført til andre mennesker, der befinder sig i nærheden af en inficeret person. Mange stater kræver, at besøgende, der er på vej ind i landet, eller indbyggere, der er på vej ud af landet, bliver vaccineret mod en række sygdomme. Disse krav kan ofte afhænge af hvilke lande en, rejsende har besøgt eller har planer om at besøge.
mt: For those who are not familiar with medical jargon, the words contagious and infectious have different meanings. A contagious disease is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacteria, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease that easily spreads to others who are in close proximity to an infected person. Many states require visitors coming into the country, or citizens leaving the country, to be vaccinated against a range of diseases. These requirements can often depend on which countries a traveler has visited or has plans to visit.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: Udbydere af personlig VPN (virtuelt privat netværk) er en glimrende måde at omgå både politisk censur og kommerciel IP-geofiltrering. De er bedre end webproxyer af flere årsager: De omdirigerer al internettrafik, ikke kun http. De plejer at tilbyde højere båndbredde og bedre servicekvalitet. De er krypterede og er derfor også sværere at spionere imod.
mt: VPN providers are a great way to circumvent both political censorship and commercial IP geofiltering. They are better than web proxies for several reasons: They redirect all internet traffic, not just http. They usually offer higher bandwidth and better service quality. They are encrypted and are therefore also harder to spy on.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: Fordi opkald bliver dirigeret via internettet, behøver du ikke at bruge et telefonselskab der hvor du bor eller der hvor du rejser. Der er heller intet krav om, at du indhenter et lokal nummer fra lokalsamfundet hvor du lever; du kan anskaffe en satellit internetforbindelse i Chicken, Alaska, og vælge et nummer der hævder at du bor i det solrige Arizona. For det meste skal du købe et globalt nummer separat, hvilket gør det muligt for PSTN-telefoner at ringe til dig. Nummerets oprindelsessted har nemlig betydning for folk der ringer til dig.
mt: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you don't have to use a phone company where you live or where you travel. There's no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community where you live; you can get a satellite Internet connection in Chicken, Alaska, and choose a number that claims you live in sunny Arizona. For the most part, you'll have to buy a global number separately, which allows PSTN phones to call you. The number's place of origin has meaning for people who call you.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.

src: Udtalen er relativt nem på italiensk, da de fleste ord udtales nøjagtig, som de skrives. De vigtigste bogstaver at holde øje med, er c og g, da deres udtale varierer afhængigt af den efterstående vokal. Sørg også for at udtale r og rr forskelligt: caro betyder kære, mens carro betyder vogn.
mt: The pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian, as most words are pronounced exactly as they are written. The most important letters to keep an eye on are c and g, as their pronunciation varies depending on the following vowel. Also make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, while carro means carriage.
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: Izmir er Tyrkiets tredjestørste by med en befolkning på cirka 3,7 millioner, landets næststørste havn efter Istanbul, og et meget stort transportknudepunkt. Det, som engang var den gamle by Smyrna, er nu en moderne, udviklet og travl handelsby beliggende omkring en stor bugt og omgivet af bjerge. De brede boulevarder, glasfacadebygningerne og de moderne indkøbscentre er omgivet af  traditionelle røde tegltage, det gamle marked fra det 18. århundrede og gamle moskeer og kirker, endskønt byen har en atmosfære, der er mere Middelhavs-Europa end det traditionelle Tyrkiet.
mt: Izmir is Turkey's third largest city with a population of around 3.7 million, the country's second largest port after Istanbul, and a very large transport hub. What was once the old city of Smyrna is now a modern, developed and busy commercial city located around a large bay and surrounded by mountains. The wide boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centres are surrounded by traditional red-tiled roofs, the old market from the 18th century and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere that is more Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: At se på blomstrende kirsebærtræer, kendt som Hanami, har været en tradition i japansk kultur siden det 8. århundrede. Konceptet kom fra Kina, hvor blomster fra blommetræer var den valgte blomst. I Japan blev de første kirsebærblomstfester afholdt af kejseren for kun ham selv og andre medlemmer af aristokratiet omkring det kejserlige hof.
mt: To view blooming cherry trees, known as Hanami, has been a tradition in Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China, where flowers from flowering trees were the chosen flower. In Japan, the first cherry blossom festivals were held by the emperor for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the imperial court.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

src: Jerusalem er hovedstaden og den største by i Israel, selvom de fleste andre lande og FN ikke anerkender den som Israels hovedstad. Den oldgamle by i det judæiske højland har en fascinerende historie, som går tusindvis af år tilbage i tiden. Byen er hellig for de tre monoteistiske religioner - jødedommen, kristendommen og islam og fungerer som et åndeligt, religiøst og kulturelt center. Grundet byens religiøse signifikans og i særdeleshed de adskillige attraktioner i Old City-området er Jerusalem et af de essentielle turistdestinationer i Israel. Jerusalem har mange historiske, arkæologiske og kulturelle steder samt livlige og propfulde indkøbscentre, caféer og restauranter.
mt: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, although most other countries and the UN do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history that goes back thousands of years. The city is holy for the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam and functions as a spiritual, religious and cultural center. Due to the city's religious significance and especially the numerous attractions in the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the essential tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historical, archaeological and cultural sites as well as lively and crowded shopping centers, cafes and restaurants.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.
