src: Kruger National Park (KNP) ligger i det nordøstlige Sydafrika og løber langs grænsen til Mozambique mod øst og Zimbabwe mod nord, mens den sydlige grænse er Crocodile River. Parken dækker 19.500 km² og er opdelt i 14 forskellige økozoner, der hver især understøtter forskelligt dyreliv. Den er en af hovedattraktionerne i Sydafrika og betragtes som flagskibet for de sydafrikanske nationalparker (SANParks). Som i alle sydafrikanske nationalparker er der daglige bevarelses- og adgangsgebyrer til parken. Det kan også være fordelagtigt at købe et Wild Card, da dette enten giver adgang til et udvalg af parker i Sydafrika eller til alle de Sydafrikas nationalparker.
mt: The Kruger National Park (KNP) is located in the north-eastern part of South Africa and runs along the border with Mozambique to the east and Zimbabwe to the north, while the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided into 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions in South Africa and is considered the flagship for South African national parks (SANParks). As in all South African national parks, there are daily conservation and access fees to the park. It may also be advantageous to buy a Wild Card, as this either gives access to a selection of parks in South Africa or to all the South African national parks.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: Dette stejle bjerg hæver sig højt over den nordlige ende af Machu Picchu, og er ofte baggrund for mange billeder af ruinerne. Det ser lidt skræmmende ud nedenfra, og det er en stejl og vanskelig opstigning, men de fleste personer i rimelig form bør være i stand til at klare det på cirka 45 minutter. Stentrin er lagt langs det meste af stien, og i de mere stejle sektioner udgør stålkabler et støttende gelænder. Når det er sagt, bør du forvente at blive forpustet, og du bør være forsigtig på de stejlere dele af ruten, især i vådt vejr da det hurtigt kan blive farligt. Der er en lille hule tæt på toppen, som man skal igennem, den er ret lav og snæver og svær at komme igennem
mt: This steep mountain rises high above the northern end of Machu Picchu, and is often the background for many pictures of the ruins. It looks a little scary from below, and it is a steep and difficult climb, but most people in reasonable shape should be able to handle it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the trail, and in the steeper sections a steel cable provides a handrail. However, you should expect to be out of breath, and be careful on the steeper parts of the route, especially in wet weather as it can quickly become dangerous. There is a small cave near the top, which you have to go through, it is quite low and narrow and hard to get through
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: Det mallorcinske køkken er, ligesom andre lignende områder ved Middelhavet, baseret på brød, grøntsager og kød (især svinekød) og brug af en hel del olivenolie. En simpel, populær middag, især om sommeren, er Pa amb Oli: Brød med olivenolie, tomat og ethvert slags tilgængeligt tilbehør såsom ost, tunfisk m.m.
mt: The Mallorcan cuisine is, like other similar areas around the Mediterranean, based on bread, vegetables and meat (especially pork) and the use of a lot of olive oil. A simple, popular dinner, especially in the summer, is Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato and any available accompaniments such as cheese, tuna etc.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: Hangi-måltider tilberedes i et varmt hul i jorden. Hullet bliver enten opvarmet med varme sten fra et bål, og nogle steder vil geotermisk varme gøre jordområder naturligt varme. Hangien bruges ofte til at tilberede en traditionel stegt middag. Flere steder i Rotorua tilbyder geotermisk hangi, mens andre hangi kan smages i Christchurch, Wellington og andre steder.
mt: Hangi meals are cooked in a hot hole in the ground. The hole is heated either with hot stones from a fire, and in some places geothermal heat will naturally warm ground areas. Hangis are often used to cook a traditional roast dinner. Geothermal hangi is offered in Rotorua, while other hangi can be tasted in Christchurch, Wellington and other places.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: Under besøg på klostrene, er kvinder forpligtet til at bære nederdele der dækker knæene, samtidig med at de også har deres skuldre dækket til. De fleste af klostrene har tørklæder til kvinder, der dukker uforberedte op, men hvis du medbringer dit eget og især nogle med stærke farver, får du et smil fra munken eller nonnen ved indgangen. På samme måde kræves det, at mænd går med bukser der dækker knæene. Dette kan lånes fra lageret ved indgangen, men tøjet bliver ikke vasket efter hver brug, så måske er du ikke helt tryg ved at have disse nederdele på. Én størrelse passer alle mænd!
mt: When visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts that cover the knees, while also having their shoulders covered. Most of the monasteries have scarves for women who show up unprepared, but if you bring your own and especially some with strong colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. In the same way, it is required that men wear pants that cover the knees. This can be borrowed from the storage at the entrance, but the clothing is not washed after each use, so maybe you are not entirely safe to have these undergarments on. One size fits all men!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: Hvis du besøger arktiske eller antarktiske områder om vinteren, vil du opleve polarnatten, hvilket betyder, at solen ikke kommer op over horisonten. Dette giver en god mulighed for at se polarlys, da himlen vil være mørk mere eller mindre døgnet rundt. Da der ikke bor mange mennesker i områderne, og lysforurening derfor ofte ikke er noget problem, vil du også kunne nyde stjernerne.
mt: If you visit Arctic or Antarctic regions in winter, you will experience polar night, which means the sun will not rise above the horizon. This gives a good chance to see the aurora, as the sky will be dark more or less all day. As there are not many people living in the regions, and light pollution is often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: I fjerne egne uden mobildækning kan en satellittelefon være din eneste mulighed. En satellittelefon er generelt ikke en erstatning for en mobiltelefon, da du skal være udenfor og have frit udsyn til satellitten for at foretage et telefonopkald. Denne tjeneste bliver ofte brugt af skibsfart, herunder lystfartøjer, såvel som ekspeditioner, der har behov for fjerndata og -tale. Din lokale telefontjenesteudbyder bør kunne give dig flere oplysninger om tilslutning til denne tjeneste.
mt: In remote areas without mobile coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not a replacement for a mobile phone, as you must be outdoors and have a clear view of the satellite to make a call. This service is often used by shipping, including yachts, as well as expeditions that need to have fresh data and voice. Your local phone service provider should be able to give you more information on connecting to this service.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: Moldovas hovedstad er Chişinău. Lokalsproget er rumænsk, men der tales også russisk i et bredt omfang. Moldova er en multietnisk republik, der har lidt under etniske konflikter. I 1994 ledte denne konflikt til oprettelsen af den selvudnævnte Transnistriske Republik i det østlige Moldova, der har sin egen regering og møntfod, men som ikke anerkendes af nogen medlemslande i FN. Økonomiske forbindelser er blevet genetableret mellem disse to dele af Moldova trods nedbruddet i de politiske forhandlinger. Den største religion i Moldova, er ortodoks kristendom.
mt: Chisinau is the capital of Moldova. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely spoken. Moldova is a multiethnic republic that has suffered ethnic conflicts. In 1994 this conflict led to the establishment of the self-proclaimed Transnistrian Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency, but is not recognized by any member states of the UN. Economic relations have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the breakdown in political negotiations. The largest religion in Moldova is Eastern Orthodox Christianity.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: "Da Montevideo ligger syd for ækvator, er det sommer der, når det er vinter på den nordlige halvkugle og vice versa. Montevideo er i subtroperne; i sommermånederne er det normalt at have temperaturer over 30°C. Vinteren kan være vildledende kølig: temperaturerne når sjældent under frysepunktet, men vinden og luftfugtigheden tilsammen får det til at føles koldere, end hvad der står på termometeret. Der er ingen særligt ""regnfulde"" og ""tørre"" årstider: mængden af regn forbliver nogenlunde den samme gennem hele året."
mt: "Since Montevideo is south of the equator, it is summer there when it is winter on the northern hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in summer months it is normal to have temperatures over 30°C. Winter can be misleadingly cool: temperatures rarely drop below freezing point, but the wind and humidity together make it feel colder than what the thermometer reads. There are no particularly ""wet"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain remains roughly the same throughout the year."
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: "Uønskede vægmalerier eller tegninger er kendt som graffiti. Selvom det er langt fra et moderne fænomen, forbinder de fleste det sikkert med, at unge vandaliserer offentlig samt privat ejendom med spraymaling. Nu til dags findes der dog kendte graffitikunstnere, graffitibegivenheder og ""lovlige"" vægge. Graffitimalerier i denne sammenhæng ligner ofte kunstværker fremfor ulæselige tags."
mt: "Unwanted wall paintings or drawings are known as graffiti. Although it is far from a modern phenomenon, most associate it with young people vandalizing public and private property with spray paint. Now, however, there are known graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti murals in this context often resemble works of art rather than illegible tags."
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: Til nogle festivaler vælger størstedelen af deltagerne til musikfestivaler at campere på stedet, og mange deltagere betragter det som en afgørende del af oplevelsen. Hvis du vil være der, hvor der er gang i den, skal du tidligt ind for at få en teltplads tæt på musikken. Husk at selvom musikken på de store scener er slut, kan der stadig være dele af festivalen, som spiller musik til sent ud på aftenen. Nogle festivaler har særlige campingområder for småbørnsfamilier.
mt: For many festivals, the majority of attendees choose to camp on site, and many attendees consider it an integral part of the experience. If you want to be where the action is, you'll need to get in early to secure a tent spot close to the music. Remember that even though the music on the main stages is over, there may still be parts of the festival playing music late into the evening. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with small children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: Fordi mange af puebloerne er så afsides, vil du ikke finde noget betydeligt natteliv medmindre du rejser til Albuquerque eller Santa Fe. Der bliver dog serveret drinks i næsten alle de kasinoer, der er anført ovenfor, og flere af dem henter kendte entertainere (primært de store der befinder sig rundt om Albuquerque og Santa Fe). Pas på: her er byens små barer ikke altid gode steder at hænge ud for besøgende fra andre stater. For det første har det nordlige New Mexico store problemer med spritkørsel, og koncentrationen af spritbilister er høj tæt på barer i små byer.
mt: Because many of the pueblos are so remote, you won't find much nightlife unless you travel to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. Drinks are served in almost all of the casinos listed above, and some of them bring in big-name entertainers (primarily the larger ones around Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Watch out: the small bars in small towns are not always good places to hang out for visitors from other states. For one thing, northern New Mexico has a big problem with drunk driving, and the concentration of drunk drivers is high near bars in small towns.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: "Den mest udbredte lokale øl er ""Number One"", som ikke er en kompliceret øl men er behagelig og forfriskende. Den anden lokale øl hedder ""Manta"". Der er mange franske vine at drikke, men de new zealandske og australske vine er måske bedre at transportere. Det er helt sikkert at drikke det lokale vand fra hanen, men det er nemt at finde flaskevand, hvis du er bekymret. For australiere er ideen om en ""flat white"" kaffe fremmed. En “short black” kaldes ""espresso"", cappuccino har masser af fløde på toppen (ikke skum), og te serveres uden mælk. Den varme chokolade lever op til de belgiske standarder. Frugtjuicer er dyre, men til gengæld fremragende."
mt: "The most common local beer is "Number One", which is not a complicated beer but is pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called "Manta". There are many French wines to drink, but the New Zealand and Australian wines are probably better to transport. It is certainly safe to drink the local water from the tap, but it is easy to find bottled water if you are concerned. For Australians, the idea of a "flat white" coffee is foreign. A "short black" is called "espresso", cappuccino has lots of cream on top (not foam), and tea is served without milk. Hot chocolate lives up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are expensive, but in return they are excellent."
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: "Guaraníerne var den mest betydningsfulde gruppe af indfødte, der boede i det område som nu er det østlige Paraguay, og de levede som semi-nomadiske jægere der også dyrkede landbrug for at overleve. Chaco-regionen var hjemsted for andre grupper af indfødte stammer såsom Guaycurúerne og Payaguáerne, som overlevede ved at jage, indsamle og fiske. Paraguay, som man tidligere kaldte ""Indiens store provins"", kom til verden i det 16. århundrede som følge af mødet mellem spanske erobrere og de indfødte befolkningsgrupper. Spanierne startede koloniseringsperioden, der varede i tre århundreder. Siden grundlæggelsen af Asunción i 1537, har Paraguay formået at bevare en masse af dens oprindelige karakter og identitet."
mt: "The Guaraní were the most significant group of indigenous people who lived in the area that is now eastern Paraguay, and they lived as semi-nomadic hunters who also practiced agriculture to survive. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering, and fishing. Paraguay, which was once called "the great province of the Indies," came into existence in the 16th century as a result of the meeting between Spanish conquerors and the indigenous population groups. The Spanish began the colonization period, which lasted for three centuries. Since the founding of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to preserve much of its original character and identity."
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: "Parisere besidder et ry om at skulle være selvoptagede, uhøflige og arrogante. Selvom dette ofte kun er en upræcis stereotype, er den bedste måde at enes med folk i Paris på, stadig at opføre sig så pænt som muligt, du skal opføre dig som en der er ""bien élevé"" (velopdraget). Det vil gøre det betydeligt lettere at komme rundt. Parisernes kølige ydre fordamper hurtigt, hvis du udviser grundlæggende høflighed."
mt: "Parisians have a reputation for being self-absorbed, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along with people in Paris is still to behave as politely as possible, you should act as if you are ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). This will make it significantly easier to get around. Parisians' cool exterior melts quickly, if you display basic politeness."
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: MetroRail har to klasser på pendlertoge i og omkring Cape Town: MetroPlus (også kaldet First Class) og Metro (kaldet Third Class). MetroPlus er mere behagelig og mindre overfyldt, men lidt dyrere - dog stadig billigere end de normale metrobilletter i Europa. Alle tog har både MetroPlus og Metro vogne; MetroPlus vogne er altid i den bagerste del af toget tættest på Cape Town.
mt: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded, but a bit more expensive - still cheaper than the normal metro tickets in Europe. All trains have both MetroPlus and Metro cars; MetroPlus cars are always in the back of the train closest to Cape Town.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: Rejsende kan støde på skadedyr, som de ikke kender hjemmefra. Skadedyr kan ødelægge mad, forårsage irritationer eller i værre tilfælde forårsage allergiske reaktioner, sprede gift eller overføre sygdomme. Smitsomme sygdomme i sig selv, eller farlige dyr, der kan såre eller dræbe mennesker, opfattes normalt ikke som skadedyr.
mt: Travelers may encounter pests they are not familiar with. Pests can damage food, cause irritation or in worse cases cause allergic reactions, spread disease or transmit disease. Diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people, are generally not considered pests.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: Enhver kiosk er fyldt med et forvirrende udvalg af forudbetalte taletidskort, som kan benyttes i mønttelefoner eller almindelige telefoner. Selvom de fleste kort er gode til opkald overalt, er nogle specialiseret i at give gode opkaldstakster til bestemte landegrupper. Adgang til disse tjenester er ofte via et toldfrit telefonnummer, som der kan ringes til fra de fleste telefoner uden omkostninger.
mt: Any kiosk is filled with a bewildering selection of prepaid calling cards, which can be used in pay phones or regular phones. While most cards are good for calls anywhere, some are specialized in giving good calling rates to certain country groups. Access to these services is often via a toll-free telephone number, which can be called from most phones without cost.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: Nationalparken Plitvicesøerne er fyldt med skovområder - hovedsageligt med bøg og nåletræer - og byder på en blanding af både alpine planter og middelhavsplanter. Den har en bemærkelsesværdigt bred variation af plantesamfund på grund af sine mange mikroklimaer, forskellige jordtyper og varierende højdeniveauer. Området er også hjemsted for en ekstrem stor variation af dyr og fuglearter. Her finder man sammen med mange mere almindelige arter sjælden fauna såsom den europæiske brune bjørn, ulv, ørn, ugle, los, vildkat og tjur.
mt: The Plitvice Lakes National Park is filled with forest areas - mainly beech and coniferous trees - and offers a mix of both alpine plants and mediterranean plants. It has a remarkably broad range of plant communities due to its many microclimates, different soil types and varying altitudes. The area is also home to an extreme large variety of animals and birds. Here one can find along with many more common species rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, deer, wildcat and chamois.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: "Medieselskaber lyver også regelmæssigt om hvad formålet er med dette, og hævder at det er at ""forebygge piratkopiering"". Faktisk har regionskoder absolut ingen effekt på ulovlig kopiering: en bid-for-bid-kopi af en disk vil afspille helt fint på en hvilken som helst enhed, hvor originalen kan afspilles. Det egentlige formål er at give disse virksomheder mere samt bedre kontrol over deres markeder; det handler om at tjene penge."
mt: "Media companies also lie regularly about what the purpose of this is, and claim that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying: a bit-for-bit copy of a disc will play just fine on any device that can play the original. The real purpose is to give these companies more and better control over their markets; it's about making money."
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: Selvom indvandringskontrol normalt ikke finder sted, eller blot er en formalitet når du ankommer til dit hjemland, kan det stadigvæk være besværligt at komme gennem toldkontrol. Sørg for, at du ved, hvad du må, og hvad du ikke må medbringe og deklarer alt, der er over de lovlige grænser.
mt: While immigration control is usually not enforced, or just a formality when you arrive at your home country, it can still be troublesome to get through customs control. Make sure you know what you are allowed to bring and what you are not allowed to bring and declare everything that is over the legal limits.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: Cochamó-dalen - Chiles største klatredestination, kendt som Sydamerikas Yosemite, har en række store granitvægge og klipper. Bjergtoppe præsenterer helt betagende udsigter fra toppene for alle besøgende. Bjergbestigere fra hele verden etablerer løbende nye ruter blandt dets uendelige potentialer for nye klatrevægge.
mt: Cochamó Valley - Chile's largest climbing destination, known as South America's Yosemite, has a range of large granite walls and cliffs. Mountain tops present breathtaking views from the tops for all visitors. Mountain climbers from all over the world are establishing new routes among its endless potential for new climbing walls.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: Hvis du kun ønsker at flyve rundt i verden på den sydlige halvkugle, er udvalget af fly begrænset på grund af kun få transoceanske ruter. Ingen sammenslutning af flyselskaber dækker alle tre oceankrydsninger på den sydlige halvkugle (og SkyTeam dækker ikke nogen af dem). Men Star Alliance dækker alt undtagen den østlige del af det sydlige Stillehav fra Santiago de Chile til Tahiti, hvilket er en rute som opereres af LATAM Oneworld. Denne flyvetur er ikke den eneste mulighed, hvis du vil springe det sydlige Stillehav og Sydamerikas vestkyst over. (se nedenfor)
mt: If you only want to fly around the world on the southern hemisphere, the selection of airlines is limited due to only a few transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings on the southern hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of them). But Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern part of the southern Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a route operated by LATAM Oneworld. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the southern Pacific and South America's west coast. (see below)
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: "Internationalt findes der næsten 200 organisationer for turløb. De fleste af dem er uafhængige. Efterfølgeren af Global Running Tours, Go Running Tours, netværker med  indtil flere sightrunning-udbydere spredt ud over fire kontinenter. Med rødder i ""Barcelonas Running Tours Barcelona"" og Københavns ""Running Copenhagen"" sluttede ""Running Tours Prague"", baseret i Prag, og andre sig hurtigt til dem."
mt: "Internationally there are almost 200 organizations for running tours. Most of them are independent. The successor of Global Running Tours, Go Running Tours, networks with several sightrunning providers spread over four continents. With roots in ""Barcelona Running Tours Barcelona"" and Copenhagen's ""Running Copenhagen"", ""Running Tours Prague"", based in Prague, and others soon joined them."
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: "Safarier er højdepunktet for mange og er måske det, der trækker allerflest turister til Afrika. Udtrykket safari bruges ofte til at referere til landrejser for at se det flotte afrikanske dyreliv, især på savannen. Nogle dyr såsom elefanter og giraffer har en tendens til at nærme sig bilerne, og standardudstyr er derfor nok til at se dyrene. Løver, geparder og leoparder er nogle gange sky, og du kan bedre se dem med en kikkert. En vandresafari (også kaldet en ""bush walk"", ""gå-safari"" eller ""safari til fods"") består af vandreture, der enten tager et par timer eller flere dage."
mt: "Safaris are the highlight for many and are perhaps what draws the most tourists to Africa. The term safari is often used to refer to land tours to see the beautiful African wildlife, especially on the savanna. Some animals such as elephants and giraffes have a tendency to approach cars, and standard equipment is therefore enough to see the animals. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy, and you can better see them with a telescope. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""walk safari"" or ""safari on foot"") consists of hikes that either take a few hours or several days."
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: Ture er billigere for større grupper, så hvis du er alene eller sammen med kun én ven, kan du prøve at mødes med andre mennesker og lave en gruppe på fire til seks personer, så i kan få en bedre pris pr. person. Dette bør dog ikke være noget du bekymrer dig om, da turister ofte bliver flyttet rundt for at fylde bilerne. Det ser faktisk ud til i højere grad at være en måde at narre folk til at tro, at de skal betale mere.
mt: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you are alone or with just one friend, you can try to meet other people and make a group of four to six people, so you can get a better price per person. This should not be something you worry about, as tourists are often moved around to fill the cars. It actually seems to be a way to trick people into thinking they will pay more.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: San Franciscos økonomi er forbundet med at være en turistattraktion i verdensklasse, mens dens økonomi er diversificeret. De største beskæftigelsessektorer er professionelle tjenesteydelser, den offentlige sektor, finans, handel og turisme. Det, at den ofte portrætteres i musik, film, litteratur og populærkultur, har været med til at gøre byen og dens vartegn kendt over hele verden. San Francisco har udviklet en stor turistinfrastruktur med talrige hoteller, restauranter og de bedste konferencefaciliteter. San Francisco er også et af de bedste steder i landet for anden asiatisk mad: koreansk, thai, indisk og japansk.
mt: San Francisco's economy is tied to being a tourist attraction of world-class, while its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, the public sector, finance, trade and tourism. The fact that it is often portrayed in music, film, literature and popular culture has been instrumental in making the city and its landmarks known worldwide. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants and the best conference facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the country for second Asian food: Korean, Thai, Indian and Japanese.
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: Forhåndsreservation giver den rejsende ro i sindet, om at de har et sted at sove, når de ankommer til deres destination. Rejseagenter har ofte tilbud på bestemte hoteller, selvom det måske er muligt for dig at booke andre former for indkvartering gennem en rejseagent, såsom campingpladser. Rejsebureauer plejer at tilbyde pakker, der inkluderer morgenmad, transportarrangementer til/fra lufthavnen eller endda kombinerede fly- og hotelpakker. De kan også holde reservationen for dig, hvis du har brug for tid til at overveje tilbuddet eller fremskaffe andre dokumenter til din destination (f.eks. et visum). Ændringer eller anmodninger bør dog rettes til rejsearrangøren først og ikke direkte til hotellet.
mt: Pre-booking gives the traveler peace of mind, that they have a place to sleep when they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have offers on certain hotels, although it may be possible for you to book other forms of accommodation through a travel agent, such as camping sites. Travel agencies usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you, if you need time to consider the offer or obtain other documents for your destination (e.g. a visa). However, changes or requests should be directed to the travel agency first and not directly to the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: Apps til tekstoversættelse i realtid - applikationer som automatisk kan oversætte hele tekstdele fra ét sprog til et andet. Nogle af programmerne i denne kategori kan endda oversætte tekster i fremmedsprog på skilte eller andre objekter i den virkelige verden, når brugeren peger sin smartphone mod disse objekter. Oversættelsesmaskinerne er blevet meget bedre, og giver nu ofte mere eller mindre korrekte oversættelser (og mere sjældent volapyk), men en vis påpasselighed er nødvendig, da de stadig kan have forstået det helt forkert. En af de mest fremtrædende apps i denne kategori er Google Translate, som giver mulighed for offline oversættelse når de foretrukne sprogdata er downloadet.
mt: Apps for real-time text translation - applications that can automatically translate entire text passages from one language to another. Some of the programs in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points their smartphone at these objects. Translation machines have become much better, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more rarely volapük), but some caution is necessary, as they still can have understood it completely wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation when the preferred language data is downloaded.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Laviner er ikke unormale; der er en grænse for, hvor meget sne stejle skråninger kan holde, så de overskydende mængder sne vil falde som laviner. Problemet er at sne er klistret, så der er brug for noget til at få det til at falde ned; og når en smule sne falder, kan være dét, der får resten til at falde. Nogle gange er det solens opvarmning af sneen, som gør udslaget, andre gange er det mere sne eller andre naturbegivenheder, og ofte er det et menneske.
mt: Avalanches are not uncommon; there is a limit to how much snow steep slopes can hold, so the excess snow will fall as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs something to get it to fall; and when a little snow falls, that may be what makes the rest fall. Sometimes it is the sun's warming of the snow that makes the difference, other times it is more snow or other natural phenomena, and often it is a person.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: "En curry er en ret baseret på urter og krydderier sammen med enten kød eller grøntsager. En curry er enten ""tør"" eller ""våd"" afhængigt af hvor meget væske, der er i den. I de indre regioner i det nordlige Indien og Pakistan bliver yoghurt ofte brugt i karryretter. I det sydlige Indien og nogle andre kystnære regioner på subkontinentet, er det almindeligt at bruge kokosmælk."
mt: "A curry is a dish based on spices, herbs and either meat or vegetables. A curry is either "dry" or "wet" depending on how much liquid is in it. In the interior regions of northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is often used in curries. In southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, it is common to use coconut milk."
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: Sydpolsruten er en 1.600 kilometer lang sti fra McMurdo station ved Rosshavet til polen. Det er komprimeret sne med sprækker, der er fyldt og markeret med flag. Det eneste, der kan bevæge sig på den, er specialiserede traktorer, der trækker slæder med brændstof og forsyninger. Disse er ikke særligt nemme, så stien skal svinge udenom de transantarktiske bjerge for at lede op på plateauet.
mt: The South Pole Route is a 1,600-kilometer-long trail from McMurdo Station at Ross Sea to the pole. It is compressed snow with cracks filled and marked with flags. The only thing that can move on it is specialized tractors pulling sleds with fuel and supplies. These are not very easy, so the trail has to swing around the Transantarctic Mountains to lead up to the plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

The only thing that can move on it is specialized tractors pulling sleds with fuel and supplies. These are not very easy, so the trail has to swing around the Transantarctic Mountains to lead up to the plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: At komme til det sydlige Afrika med bil er en fantastisk måde at se hele regionens skønhed på såvel som at finde steder udenfor de normale turistruter. Dette kan gøres i en normal bil med forsigtig planlægning, men en firhjulstrækker anbefales stærkt, og mange steder er kun tilgængelige med en firhjulstrækker med en høj hjulbase. Husk, når du planlægger, at selvom Sydafrika er stabilt, så er det ikke alle nabolande, der er det. Visumkrav og omkostninger varierer fra nation til nation og ændrer sig afhængigt af det land, du kommer fra. Hvert land har også unikke love, der kræver forskellige genstande til nødsituationer, der skal være at finde i bilen.
mt: To get to southern Africa by car is a fantastic way to see the whole region's beauty as well as to find places off the beaten tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning, but a four-wheel drive is strongly recommended, and many places are only accessible with a four-wheel drive with a high ground clearance. Remember, when you plan, that although South Africa is stable, not all its neighbors are. Visa requirements and costs vary from country to country and change depending on the country you are coming from. Each country also has unique laws that require different items for emergencies that should be found in the car.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Bære andres bagage - Du må aldrig lade dine tasker komme ud af syne, især når du krydser internationale grænser. Du kanne opleve dig selv blive brugt som en narkotikabærer uden din viden, hvilket vil forårsage en masse problemer for dig. Dette inkluderer at stå i kø, da narkohunde kan komme i brug når som helst uden varsel. Nogle lande har meget strenge straffe, selv for førstegangsforbrydelser, f.eks. fængselsstraffe på over 10 år eller dødsstraf. Efterladte tasker er et mål for tyve, og kan også tiltrække opmærksomhed fra myndigheder der er på vagt for bombetrusler.
mt: Carry other people's luggage - You should never let your bags out of sight, especially when crossing international borders. You may find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will cause you a lot of problems. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs can be used at any time without warning. Some countries have very harsh penalties, even for first-time offenders, such as prison sentences of over 10 years or the death penalty. Abandoned luggage is a target for thieves, and can also attract attention from authorities on the lookout for bomb threats.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: Fyld dit hjem med en smagsrig kaffe om morgenen samt afslappende kamillete om aftenen. Når du er på en staycation, har du tid til at forkæle dig selv og bruge et par ekstra minutter på at brygge noget specielt. Hvis du føler dig mere eventyrlysten, kan du gribe muligheden for at lave nogle smoothies: måske vil du finde en simpel drik, som du kan lave til din morgenmad, når du vender tilbage til din daglige rutine. Hvis du bor i en by med en varieret drikkekultur, kan du tage på barer eller pubber i kvarterer, du normalt ikke besøger.
mt: Fill your home with a flavorful coffee in the morning and relaxing chamomile tea in the evening. When you're on a staycation, you have time to pamper yourself and use a few extra minutes to brew something special. If you feel more adventurous, you can take the opportunity to make some smoothies: maybe you'll find a simple drink that you can make for your breakfast when you return to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a diverse drinking culture, you can go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you normally don't visit.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: Landsbyen Haldarsvík har udsigt over den nærliggende ø Eysturoy og har en usædvanlig ottekantet kirke. På kirkegården er der interessante marmorskulpturer af duer over nogle gravsten. Det er værd at bruge en halv times tid på at gå rundt i den spændende landsby.
mt: The village of Haldarsvík has a view of the nearby island of Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. The churchyard has interesting marble sculptures of doves over some gravestones. It is worth spending half an hour walking around the interesting village.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: Selvom du måske ikke har brug for et visum til korte besøg som turist i visse lande, eller til forretningsbesøg, kræver det ofte et længere ophold at tage derhen som udenlandsk studerende, end at tage derhen som en afslappet turist. Generelt skal man have et visum på forhånd, hvis man skal opholde sig i et fremmed land i en længere periode. Studievisum har generelt forskellige krav og ansøgningsprocedurer, i forhold til normale turist- eller forretningsvisum. I de fleste lande skal du bruge et optagelsesbrev fra den institution, som du ønsker at studere ved, samt bevis for midler til at forsørge dig selv i mindst det første år. Kontakt institutionen samt immigrationsstyrelsen  i det land du ønsker at studere i for detaljerede oplysninger om kravene.
mt: Even though you may not need a visa for short visits as a tourist in some countries, or for business visits, it often requires a longer stay to go there as an international student, than to go there as a relaxed tourist. Generally, you need a visa in advance if you are going to stay in a foreign country for a longer period. Study visas generally have different requirements and application procedures, compared to normal tourist or business visas. In most countries, you will need an acceptance letter from the institution you wish to study at, as well as proof of funds to support yourself for at least the first year. Contact the institution and the immigration authority in the country you wish to study in for detailed information on the requirements.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: Især om sommeren skal du passe på myg, hvis du beslutter dig for at vandre gennem regnskoven. Selvom du kører gennem den subtropiske regnskov, er det nok at dine døre er åbne i et par sekunder, mens du sætter dig ind i bilen, for at myg kan komme ind i bilen med dig.
mt: Especially in the summer, you should watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to walk through the rainforest. Even if you drive through the subtropical rainforest, it is enough for your doors to be open for a few seconds while you get in the car, for mosquitoes to come in with you.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: Sundarbans er det største kystnære mangrovebælte i verden, der strækker sig 80 km fra kysten og ind i Bangladesh og Indiens bagland. Sundarbans er blevet tilføjet til UNESCOs verdensarvsliste. Den del af skoven, der er inden for indisk territorium kaldes Sundarbans National Park. Skovene er dog ikke bare mangrovesumpe — de omfatter nogle af de sidste resterende bevoksninger af de mægtige skove, der engang dækkede den gangetiske slette. Sundarbans dækker et område på 3.850 km², hvoraf omkring en tredjedel er dækket af vand/moseområder. Sundarbans har siden 1966 været et vildtreservat, og det anslås, at der nu findes 400 bengalske kongetigre og omkring 30.000 chitalhjorte i området.
mt: Sundarbans is the largest coastal mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km from the coast and into Bangladesh and India's hinterland. Sundarbans has been added to UNESCO's World Heritage List. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests are not just mangrove swamps - they include some of the last remaining vestiges of the mighty forests that once covered the gangetic plain. Sundarbans covers an area of 3,850 km², of which about a third is covered by water/marsh areas. Sundarbans has been a wildlife sanctuary since 1966, and it is estimated that there are now 400 bengal tigers and about 30,000 chital deer in the area.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: Verden har over 5.000 forskellige sprog, hvorunder mere end tyve af disse har 50 millioner eller flere talere. Skrevne ord er ofte også lettere at forstå end de udtalte ord. Dette gælder især for adresser, som ofte er svære at udtale på en forståelig måde. Befolkningen i mange lande taler flydende engelsk, og i endnu flere lande kan man forvente et vist kendskab - især blandt yngre mennesker. Forestil dig folk fra både Manchester, Boston, Jamaica og Sydney sidde omkring et bord og spise middag sammen på en restaurant i Toronto. De underholder hinanden med historier fra deres hjembyer fortalt med deres lokale accenter og særlige jargon.
mt: The world has over 5,000 different languages, of which more than twenty have 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words. This is especially true for addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce in an understandable way. The population of many countries speaks fluent English, and in even more countries one can expect some familiarity - especially among younger people. Imagine people from both Manchester, Boston, Jamaica and Sydney sitting around a table and having dinner together at a restaurant in Toronto. They entertain each other with stories from their hometowns told with their local accents and special jargon.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Der kører busser fra den tværregionale busstation (på den anden side af floden) hele dagen selvom de fleste, især dem der går mod øst og til Jakar/Bumthang, afgår mellem klokken 06:30 og 07:30. Da busserne i distriktet ofte er fulde, er det en god ide at købe en billet et par dage i forvejen. De fleste distrikter betjenes af små, japanske busser, som er både behagelige og robuste. Deletaxaer er en hurtig og behagelig måde at rejse til nærliggende steder på, eksempelvis Paro (150 Nu) og Punakha (200 Nu).
mt: There are buses from the trans-regional bus station (on the other side of the river) all day, although most, especially those going east and to Jakar/Bumthang, depart between 6:30 and 7:30. As buses in the district are often full, it is a good idea to buy a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese buses, which are both comfortable and robust. Dele-taxi are a quick and comfortable way to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (150 Nu) and Punakha (200 Nu).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: "Sammen med byens relative utilgængelighed har det gjort ""Timbuktu"" til en metafor for eksotiske, fjerne egne. I dag er Timbuktu en fattig by, selvom dens omdømme gør den til en turistattraktion, og den har en lufthavn. I 1990 blev det tilføjet listen over truede verdensarvsteder på grund af truslen fra ørkensandet. Det var et af de større stop under Henry Louis Gates' særlige Wonders of the African World for PBS. Byen står i skarp kontrast til resten af landets byer, fordi den har et mere arabisk flair end et afrikansk."
mt: "Along with the city's relative inaccessibility, it has made "Timbuktu" a metaphor for exotic, faraway places. Today, Timbuktu is a poor city, though its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of threatened World Heritage Sites due to the threat of desertification. It was one of the larger stops under Henry Louis Gates' special PBS series Wonders of the African World. The city stands in sharp contrast to the rest of the country's cities, as it has a more Arab flair than an African."
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: De paralympiske lege finder sted fra den 24. august til den 5. september 2021. Nogle arrangementer vil blive afholdt andre steder i Japan. Tokyo bliver den eneste asiatiske by til at have været vært for to sommer-OL, da den også var vært for legene i 1964. Hvis du bookede dine fly og din indkvartering for 2020 før udsættelsen blev annonceret, kan du få problemer. Afbestillingspolitikker varierer, men fra slutningen af marts strækker de fleste coronavirusbaserede afbestillingspolitikker sig ikke til juli 2020, da OL blev planlagt. Det forventes, at de fleste billetter til begivenheden vil koste mellem ¥2.500 og ¥130.000, hvor typiske billetter koster omkring ¥7.000.
mt: 2020 Summer Paralympics will be held from August 24 to September 5, 2021. Some events will be held elsewhere in Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two Summer Olympics, as it also hosted the 1964 Games. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have problems. Cancellation policies vary, but from the end of March, most coronavirus-based cancellation policies do not extend to July 2020, when the Olympics were planned. It is expected that most tickets for the event will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, where typical tickets cost around ¥7,000.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: "En tornado er en roterende søjle af luft med meget lavt tryk som suger den omkringliggende luft indad og opad. De genererer stærke vinde (ofte 100-200 mil/time) og kan løfte tunge genstande op i luften og bære dem rundt, når tornadoen bevæger sig. De starter som tragte, der kommer ned fra stormskyer, og bliver ""tornadoer"", når de rører jorden."
mt: "A tornado is a rotating column of air with very low pressure that sucks in the surrounding air. They generate strong winds (often 100-200 mph) and can lift heavy objects into the air and carry them around when the tornado moves. They start as funnels that come down from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: Hvis der opstår rejseanvisninger i det land, du besøger, kan din rejseforsikring eller afbestillingsforsikring måske blive påvirket. Det kan også være, at du ønsker at få råd fra andre regeringer end din egen, men deres råd vil være udformet til deres egne borgere. Ét eksempel er, at amerikanske statsborgere i Mellemøsten måske står over for en anden situation end europæere eller arabere. Rådgivningerne er kun et kort overblik over den politiske tilstand i et land. De fremsatte synspunkter er ofte med et korvarigt blik på sagen, generelle og forenklede i forhold til de mere detaljerede oplysninger, der kan findes andre steder.
mt: If travel advisories are issued in the country you are visiting, your travel insurance or cancellation insurance may be affected. It may also be that you want advice from other governments than your own, but their advice will be tailored to their own citizens. An example is that American citizens in the Middle East may face a different situation than Europeans or Arabs. The advice is only a brief overview of the political situation in a country. The opinions are often with a grain of salt, general and simplified compared to the more detailed information that can be found elsewhere.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: Rejsebureauer har eksisteret siden det 19. århundrede. En rejseagent er normalt en god måde at finde en rejse på, der strækker sig ud over en rejsendes tidligere erfaringer med natur, kultur, sprog eller lavindkomstlande. Selvom de fleste bureauer er villige til at påtage sig de fleste almindelige reservationer, specialiserer mange agenter sig i bestemte rejsetyper, prisklasser eller destinationer. Det kan være bedre at benytte en agent, som jævnligt booker lignende ture til dig. Kig på de ture bureauet tilbyder enten på deres hjemmeside eller i deres butiksvindue.
mt: Travel agencies have existed since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good way to find a trip that extends beyond a traveler's previous experiences with nature, culture, language, or low-income countries. While most agencies are willing to take on most ordinary reservations, many agents specialize in certain trip types, price classes, or destinations. It may be better to use an agent who regularly books similar tours to you. Look at the tours the agency offers either on their website or in their storefront window.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: "Der er mange ting, du skal overveje, før og når du rejser et sted hen. Når du rejser, skal du forvente at tingene ikke er, som de er ""derhjemme"". Manerer, love og regler, mad, trafik, bosteder, standarder, sprog og så videre vil til en vis grad være forskellige fra der hvor du bor. Dette er noget, som du altid skal huske på for at undgå skuffelser eller måske endda negativitet over de lokales måder at gøre tingene på."
mt: "There are many things you should consider before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, you should expect things not to be as they are ""at home"". Manners, laws and rules, food, traffic, housing, standards, language and so on will to some extent be different from where you live. This is something you should always remember to avoid disappointments or even negativity about the locals' ways of doing things."
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: Hvis du rejser til et uland for første gang - eller til en ny del af verden - skal du ikke undervurdere det potentielle kulturchok. Mange stabile og erfarne rejsende er blevet overvældet af det nye ved udviklingen af verdensrejser, hvor mange små kulturelle justeringer hurtigt kan blive overvældende. Især i dine første dage, bør du overveje ikke at holde tilbage med at bruge penge på hoteller, mad og service i vestlig stil og kvalitet for at hjælpe dig med at falde til. Sov ikke på en madras eller pude på jorden, i områder hvor du ikke kender til det lokale dyreliv. Hvis du vil campere, bør du medbringe en lejrseng eller hængekøje for at holde slanger, skorpioner og så videre væk.
mt: If you are traveling to a developing country for the first time - or to a new part of the world - don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many stable and experienced travelers have been overwhelmed by the newness of world travel, where many small cultural adjustments can quickly become overwhelming. Especially in your first few days, consider not holding back on spending money on hotels, food and service in a western style and quality to help you adjust. Don't sleep on a mattress or pillow on the ground, in areas where you don't know the local wildlife. If you want to camp, bring a sleeping bag or hammock to keep snakes, scorpions and so on away.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: "Lav kopier af din police og dit forsikringsselskabs kontaktoplysninger, og sørg for at have dem med dig. De skal vise forsikringsselskabets e-mailadresse og internationale telefonnumre for rådgivning/autorisationer og for at anmelde sager. Sørg for at have en ekstra kopi i din bagage og online (sendt som vedhæftning i en e-mail til dig selv eller gemt i ""skyen""). Hvis du rejser med en bærbar computer eller tablet, kan du lagre en kopi i hukommelsen eller på disken (tilgængelig uden internet). Giv også kopier af policen/kontaktoplysninger til medrejsende samt familie eller venner derhjemme som er villige til at hjælpe."
mt: "Copy your insurance policy and your insurance company's contact information, and make sure you have them with you. They should show the insurance company's email address and international telephone numbers for advice/authorizations and to report claims. Make sure to have an extra copy in your luggage and online (sent as an attachment in an email to yourself or saved in the ""cloud""). If you travel with a laptop or tablet, you can store a copy in memory or on the disk (available without internet). Also give copies of the policy/contact information to fellow travelers and family or friends at home who are willing to help."
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: I årenes løb er der blevet brugt mange forskellige filmformater. Standard 35 mm-film (36 x 24 mm negativ) er klart den mest almindelige. Den kan som regel genopfyldes rimelig nemt, hvis du løber tør, og giver opløsning, der er nogenlunde sammenlignelig med et aktuelt DSLR. Nogle filmkameraer i medium format bruger et format på 6 x 6 cm, mere præcist et 56 x 56 mm negativt format. Dette giver en opløsning, der er næsten fire gange større end et 35 mm negativ (3136 mm2 mod 864).
mt: 35 mm film (36 x 24 mm negative) is clearly the most common. It can usually be reloaded fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution that is roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium format film cameras use a 6 x 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 x 56 mm negative format. This gives a resolution that is nearly four times larger than a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 vs. 864).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: Den nemmeste måde at komme i gang med professionel rejseskrivning er at finpudse dine færdigheder på en etableret rejsebloghjemmeside. Når du er blevet fortrolig med at formattere og redigere på nettet, kan du med tiden skabe din egen hjemmeside.
mt: The easiest way to get started with professional travel writing is to polish your skills on an established travel blog website. Once you are familiar with formatting and editing on the web, you can eventually create your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.
